The music stops , but it can be clearly seen that the CD was never spinning in the first place.
0753
Continuity: When James crashes the car into the tree the windshield cracks. However when he was woken up by his mother the next morning the windshield is perfectly fine.
tp
Continuity : When James crashes the car into the tree , the windshield cracks. However when he was woken up by his mother the next morning , the windshield is perfectly fine.
0754
Factual errors: Much of the film's plot is driven by inaccurate representations of California divorce law. Under the community property theory factors like infidelity are virtually irrelevant to the distribution of property upon divorce.
tp
Factual errors : Much of the film's plot is driven by inaccurate representations of California divorce law. Under the community property theory , factors like infidelity are virtually irrelevant to the distribution of property upon divorce.
0755
Continuity: At the first interview of Jack with Dr. Lorenson the clothes of Jack appear opened then closed and opened again.
tp
Continuity : At the first interview of Jack with Dr. Lorenson , the clothes of Jack appear opened , then closed and opened again.
0756
Continuity: The position of Stokely in between shots after Marybeth punches her to the gym floor. (Watch the black line.)
tp
Continuity : The position of Stokely in between shots after Marybeth punches her to the gym floor. ( Watch the black line. )
0757
Factual errors: You cannot get a dishonorable discharge from an investigation board. Only a general court-martial can give a DD. Furthermore DDs can only be given to enlisted personnel. Commissioned officers are given a dismissal from the service which carries the same penalties and social stigma associated with a dishonorable discharge.
tp
Factual errors : You cannot get a dishonorable discharge from an investigation board. Only a general court - martial can give a DD. Furthermore , DDs can only be given to enlisted personnel. Commissioned officers are given a dismissal from the service , which carries the same penalties and social stigma associated with a dishonorable discharge.
0758
Factual errors: In the scene where Chelios goes outside after escaping the hospital he is behind a crate when a man sneaks up behind him with a Springfield Armory XD pistol. These pistols have a cocking pin indicator as well as a round indicator on the top of the slide. In this scene the round indicator is down meaning there is no round in the chamber. Chelios does a brass check after disarming the man and does not rack a round in the chamber. In the following scene he shots two men with this weapon without a round chambered.
tp
Factual errors : In the scene where Chelios goes outside after escaping the hospital he is behind a crate when a man sneaks up behind him with a Springfield Armory XD pistol. These pistols have a cocking pin indicator , as well as a round indicator on the top of the slide. In this scene the round indicator is down , meaning there is no round in the chamber. Chelios does a brass check after disarming the man , and does not rack a round in the chamber. In the following scene he shots two men with this weapon without a round chambered.
0759
Continuity: After Aki removes the phantom particles from Gray she picks up a canister that's hovering in the air when she originally placed it on the table further away.
tp
Continuity : After Aki removes the phantom particles from Gray , she picks up a canister that's hovering in the air , when she originally placed it on the table further away.
0760
Continuity: When Herger offers Ahmed mead in which Ahmed refuses because he can't drink fermented grapes or wheat the shape and position of the horn of mead alters drastically.
tp
Continuity : When Herger offers Ahmed mead , in which Ahmed refuses because he can't drink fermented grapes or wheat , the shape and position of the horn of mead alters drastically.

Revealing mistakes: Jacki gives Faith a tattoo. Faith shows the tattoo to Sally and says "Jacki just did it today." The Tattoo showed no signs of being new at all. No redness no swelling no irritation and no Vaseline covering it. It looked as if it had been done months ago.
tp
Revealing mistakes : Jacki gives Faith a tattoo. Faith shows the tattoo to Sally and says , "Jacki just did it today." The Tattoo showed no signs of being new at all. No redness , no swelling , no irritation and no Vaseline covering it. It looked as if it had been done months ago.

0816
Miscellaneous: At one point William Forrester chides Jamal about "The single most important criteria" of writing. Given how precise his character is about language it is unlikely that he would use the plural (criteria) instead of the singular (criterion) - (although after leading with the tautological cliché "the single most important" perhaps linguistic clumsiness is only to be expected).
tp
Miscellaneous : At one point , William Forrester chides Jamal about "The single most important criteria" of writing. Given how precise his character is about language , it is unlikely that he would use the plural ( criteria ) instead of the singular ( criterion ) - ( although after leading with the tautological cliché , "the single most important" , perhaps linguistic clumsiness is only to be expected ) .

0818

tp

0820

tp

0821

tp

0822
Continuity: About 25 minutes in a man in red trousers walks along the sidewalk. The same shot repeats about 10 minutes later.
tp
Continuity : About 25 minutes in , a man in red trousers walks along the sidewalk. The same shot repeats about 10 minutes later.
0823
Errors in geography: When Freddy heads into NYC to meet with Tilden and IA he walks under a PATH train sign as he walks up a stairway and then is right in the heart of City Hall and One Police Plaza so the premise is that he took the PATH train from Hoboken to City Hall/One Police Plaza area - that isn't possible. The Path train would let him off a few blocks away at the World Trade Center area. In reality Stallone was walking out of a subway station in City Hall with a fake PATH sign added by the director.
tp
Errors in geography : When Freddy heads into NYC to meet with Tilden and IA , he walks under a PATH train sign as he walks up a stairway and then is right in the heart of City Hall and One Police Plaza , so the premise is that he took the PATH train from Hoboken to City Hall / One Police Plaza area - that isn't possible. The Path train would let him off a few blocks away at the World Trade Center area. In reality , Stallone was walking out of a subway station in City Hall with a fake PATH sign added by the director.
0824
Errors in geography: At the end of the movie the family is seen driving back from New England to New York City. Their car travels west over the Queensboro Bridge from Queens into Manhattan. It makes very little sense to ever enter Queens when coming from New England if traveling into Manhattan. The Triboro Bridge (now called the RFK Bridge) which takes you from the Bronx to Queens can also take you to Manhattan. Entering Queens would make the trip longer and cause you to pay an extra toll.
tp
Errors in geography : At the end of the movie the family is seen driving back from New England to New York City. Their car travels west over the Queensboro Bridge from Queens into Manhattan. It makes very little sense to ever enter Queens when coming from New England if traveling into Manhattan. The Triboro Bridge ( now called the RFK Bridge ) which takes you from the Bronx to Queens can also take you to Manhattan. Entering Queens would make the trip longer and cause you to pay an extra toll.
0825
Plot holes: Jack starts developing Susie's 24 rolls of film at the rate of one per month about 6 months after her death. However according to the article in Harvey's scrapbook it is at least 4.5 years after Susie's death when Jack collects the final roll.
tp
Plot holes : Jack starts developing Susie's 24 rolls of film at the rate of one per month about 6 months after her death. However , according to the article in Harvey's scrapbook , it is at least 4.5 years after Susie's death when Jack collects the final roll.
0826
Anachronisms: The shotgun shells that Zus uses appear to be plastic hulled from the 1960s.
tp
Anachronisms : The shotgun shells that Zus uses appear to be plastic hulled , from the 1960s.
0827
Factual errors: When Will and Summer are called to the hospital a nurse tells them that Hampton has suffered an "aortal rupture." In medical terminology all terms relating to the aorta are "aortic". There is no such word as aortal. Notwithstanding this an aortic rupture is a life threatening condition. Anyone who has this would either be dead or in the Intensive Care Unit heavily sedated not conversing easily like Hampton was. At the very least he should have had a blood transfusion bag hanging over his bed.
tp
Factual errors : When Will and Summer are called to the hospital , a nurse tells them that Hampton has suffered an "aortal rupture." In medical terminology , all terms relating to the aorta are "aortic". There is no such word as aortal. Notwithstanding this , an aortic rupture is a life threatening condition. Anyone who has this would either be dead or in the Intensive Care Unit heavily sedated , not conversing easily like Hampton was. At the very least , he should have had a blood transfusion bag hanging over his bed.
0828
Continuity: When Leslie gives Jess his birthday present on the school bus her hair is covering her left ear in shots from one angle (at 00:35:42) and is behind her left ear from other angles (at 00:35:36).
tp
Continuity : When Leslie gives Jess his birthday present on the school bus , her hair is covering her left ear in shots from one angle ( at 00 : 35 : 42 ) and is behind her left ear from other angles ( at 00 : 35 : 36 ) .
0829
Continuity: At approx 9:30 into the movie Guy is exiting the Hoover shop (vacuum repair shop) where he works and twice there is a mistake between shots of the open/close sign on the front door once before he says he is going to flip the sign and then once again after he flips the sign and the shot goes back to the shop and then to the door again.
tp
Continuity : At approx 9 : 30 into the movie , Guy is exiting the Hoover shop ( vacuum repair shop ) where he works , and twice there is a mistake between shots of the open / close sign on the front door , once before he says he is going to flip the sign and then once again after he flips the sign , and the shot goes back to the shop and then to the door again.
0830
Continuity: At Brandon's birthday party John sits down by Brandon and Brandon's cigarette jumps from behind his left ear to his right and back between shots.
tp
Continuity : At Brandon's birthday party , John sits down by Brandon , and Brandon's cigarette jumps from behind his left ear to his right and back between shots.
0831

tp

0876
Continuity: One twin fires at a gold Chevy Tahoe that has come between his vehicle and Trinity's Cadillac. As we cut away no shots have hit the roof of the Tahoe. When we cut to the front view of the car turning over it has fifteen bullet holes in five neat rows in the roof which can not have appeared during the brief close-up of the gunman between the two shots.
tp
Continuity : One twin fires at a gold Chevy Tahoe that has come between his vehicle and Trinity's Cadillac. As we cut away , no shots have hit the roof of the Tahoe. When we cut to the front view of the car turning over , it has fifteen bullet holes in five neat rows in the roof which can not have appeared during the brief close - up of the gunman between the two shots.

tp

0878
Continuity: After Spider-Man loses his powers for the first time he falls in a puddle which soaks his hair and leaves one part of it sticking up. As soon as he attempts to climb the wall though his hair is not only slightly wet but it is perfectly combed.
tp
Continuity : After Spider - Man loses his powers for the first time , he falls in a puddle which soaks his hair and leaves one part of it sticking up. As soon as he attempts to climb the wall , though , his hair is not only slightly wet but it is perfectly combed.
0879
Continuity: When Yen back-flips onto the cabinet in the vault he over-leaps and his body goes over the edge. In the next shot from behind the cabinet his body is on the cabinet and his legs are over the edge.
tp
Continuity : When Yen back - flips onto the cabinet in the vault he over - leaps and his body goes over the edge. In the next shot , from behind the cabinet , his body is on the cabinet and his legs are over the edge.
0880
Continuity: When Benjamin first makes tea for the channel swimmer in the glass mugs the level of liquid fluctuates with each camera shot.
tp
Continuity : When Benjamin first makes tea for the channel swimmer in the glass mugs , the level of liquid fluctuates with each camera shot.
0881
Audio/visual unsynchronized: When Szpilman's father is slapped by the German officer the officer is obviously wearing gloves which should not have made a sharp sound.
tp
Audio / visual unsynchronized : When Szpilman's father is slapped by the German officer , the officer is obviously wearing gloves which should not have made a sharp sound.
0882
Revealing mistakes: When Rob is on the phone to Beth we can clearly see he is using a Nokia cellphone. However when he hangs up it makes the standard Motorola "end call" tone.
tp
Revealing mistakes : When Rob is on the phone to Beth , we can clearly see he is using a Nokia cellphone. However , when he hangs up , it makes the standard Motorola "end call" tone.
0883
Continuity: During the scene where Elizabeth is giving the rousing speech to the pirates on the gunwales of the ship all the close up frontal shots of her show her hair partly tied up. Rear shots show her hair completely loose but damp and limp. As she jumps down from the gunwales her hair is loose dry and bouncy. Will Turner's hair in the same scenes sometimes appear neatly tied back at other times flying in the wind in his face.
tp
Continuity : During the scene where Elizabeth is giving the rousing speech to the pirates on the gunwales of the ship , all the close up frontal shots of her show her hair partly tied up. Rear shots show her hair completely loose but damp and limp. As she jumps down from the gunwales , her hair is loose , dry and bouncy. Will Turner's hair in the same scenes sometimes appear neatly tied back , at other times flying in the wind in his face.
0884
Errors made by characters (possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers): When the characters are discussing what it would take to shut down power to the building which houses the Source it is stated that they would have to shut down 27 grids. When Trinity actually invades the backup station to perform the shutdown the computer says that grids 21-48 are being shut down. That is 28 grids.
tp
Errors made by characters ( possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers ): When the characters are discussing what it would take to shut down power to the building which houses the Source it is stated that they would have to shut down 27 grids. When Trinity actually invades the backup station to perform the shutdown the computer says that grids 21 - 48 are being shut down. That is 28 grids.
0885
Errors in geography: The Cantab Lounge is a folk and bluegrass club in Cambridge between Harvard and MIT. It is highly unlikely that Boston police would congregate there on any night much less grab a drink there.
tp
Errors in geography : The Cantab Lounge is a folk and bluegrass club in Cambridge , between Harvard and MIT. It is highly unlikely that Boston police would congregate there on any night , much less grab a drink there.
0886
Continuity: When Maddy and Danny dance on the beach bar on one scene she holds her hand around Danny's neck and on the next she does not.
tp
Continuity : When Maddy and Danny dance on the beach bar , on one scene she holds her hand around Danny's neck and on the next she does not.
0887
Continuity: When Bella is in bed on the phone with her mother she's wearing gray shorts. Moments later when she and Edward are making out her shorts are gone and she's wearing green panties.
tp
Continuity : When Bella is in bed on the phone with her mother , she's wearing gray shorts. Moments later when she and Edward are making out , her shorts are gone and she's wearing green panties.
0888
Crew or equipment visible: In "Car Chase City" when the Cutlass Supreme does the flip and it lands a camera can clearly be seen coming from the bottom of the car.
tp
Crew or equipment visible : In "Car Chase City" when the Cutlass Supreme does the flip and it lands a camera can clearly be seen coming from the bottom of the car.
0889
Continuity: When Violet gives Gloria the piece of wedding cake Gloria uses the fork in the first shot the fork is down on the plate in the next and then she is using it again after that.
tp
Continuity : When Violet gives Gloria the piece of wedding cake , Gloria uses the fork in the first shot , the fork is down on the plate in the next , and then she is using it again after that.
0890

tp

0891
Continuity: After the enemy submarine has fired two torpedoes Cpt. Ramsey orders a sharp turn to portside. However in the following exterior shot the Alabama is shown making a turn to starboard.
tp
Continuity : After the enemy submarine has fired two torpedoes , Cpt. Ramsey orders a sharp turn to portside. However , in the following exterior shot the Alabama is shown making a turn to starboard.
0892

tp

0893

Also during his journey the train he passes going the opposite direction is a present day subway train.
tp
Anachronisms : George Clooney is shown traveling in a sleek slightly futuristic rapid transit train but the rear projection / blue screen out the window clearly shows the current day "Merchandise Mart" station of the Chicago CTA Subway. Also during his journey the train he passes going the opposite direction is a present day subway train.

tp

0895
Continuity: When Afrim and the LA Cop pull Kit over at the end of the movie the LA Cop gets out of the car first. When we cut back to the car to see Afrim getting out the LA Cop sitting in the car talking on the radio.
tp

tp

tp

0899
Continuity: In the beginning the victim has been bludgeoned in the back of the neck. However in the flashback Walter hits him almost dead on in the face. Even within the flashback there is an error; from one angle the victim is quarter turned to face Walter the next shot he is completely turned around.
tp
Continuity : In the beginning , the victim has been bludgeoned in the back of the neck. However , in the flashback , Walter hits him almost dead on in the face. Even within the flashback there is an error ; from one angle the victim is quarter turned to face Walter , the next shot he is completely turned around.
0900
Crew or equipment visible: When Adam is grabbing on to the fence hanging down the cliff you can see a karabiner attached to the fence.
tp
Crew or equipment visible : When Adam is grabbing on to the fence hanging down the cliff , you can see a karabiner attached to the fence.
0901
Continuity: Blake buys a half-empty bottle in the bar. Minutes later when he offers Thel a drink outside the bottle is filled almost to the neck.
tp
Continuity : Blake buys a half - empty bottle in the bar. Minutes later , when he offers Thel a drink outside , the bottle is filled almost to the neck.
0902
Incorrectly regarded as goofs: It is impossible for the moon to remain in scattered fragments after such a long time as 800000 years. By that time gravity would have caused the fragments to fall back together into one contiguous moon or to form a ring around the Earth. However the later shot of the moon in the far-flung future shows that it is continuing to fracture indicating that the detonation that cased it to fragment in the first place was much deeper than simply a few stray fragments and the stretching between the two time periods shows that the pieces are becoming the aforementioned ring.
tp
Incorrectly regarded as goofs : It is impossible for the moon to remain in scattered fragments after such a long time as 800 , 000 years. By that time , gravity would have caused the fragments to fall back together into one contiguous moon or to form a ring around the Earth. However , the later shot of the moon in the far - flung future shows that it is continuing to fracture , indicating that the detonation that cased it to fragment in the first place was much deeper than simply a few stray fragments , and the stretching between the two time periods shows that the pieces are becoming the aforementioned ring.
0903
Continuity: When Ryan is in the boathouse he does not appear to be wet after diving into the water.
tp
Continuity : When Ryan is in the boathouse , he does not appear to be wet after diving into the water.
0904
Plot holes: In the roller coaster premonition Frankie's camcorder falls out of his hands and is instrumental in the roller coaster cars' wheels coming dislodged leading to the majority of the accidents that occur. After the premonition is over Frankie gets off the coaster meaning that the accident may not have happened. Even though the hydraulic pipe was leaking it was only after the car drove over Frankie's camcorder that the major damage occurred.
tp
Plot holes : In the roller coaster premonition , Frankie's camcorder falls out of his hands and is instrumental in the roller coaster cars' wheels coming dislodged , leading to the majority of the accidents that occur. After the premonition is over , Frankie gets off the coaster , meaning that the accident may not have happened. Even though the hydraulic pipe was leaking , it was only after the car drove over Frankie's camcorder that the major damage occurred.
0905
Continuity: The neon sign on the restaurant across from the office has 4 or 5 of its letters on each line not operating. In the scene where Aaronow and Moss are in a car across from the restaurant all of the letters on the sign are illuminated as can be seen out the window of the car behind Moss. When they get out of the car the letters are again not working.
tp
Continuity : The neon sign on the restaurant across from the office has 4 or 5 of its letters on each line not operating. In the scene where Aaronow and Moss are in a car across from the restaurant , all of the letters on the sign are illuminated , as can be seen out the window of the car behind Moss. When they get out of the car , the letters are , again , not working.
0906
Continuity: When the boss's date is straddling him in his office sometimes her hair is wrapped in a scarf and sometimes it's not.
tp
Continuity : When the boss's date is straddling him in his office , sometimes her hair is wrapped in a scarf and sometimes it's not.
0907

tp

0953
Factual errors: Senator Avery talks about going for his 8th term but this is impossible. Even assuming the shortest possible time in office (serving only one day of a vacated Senator's position as his first term plus 5 full terms of 6 years each and he is speaking on the first day of his 7th term) this equals 30 years and two days. He directly states he is 52 and you cannot become a Senator unless you are at least 30 meaning he must be an absolute minimum of 60 yeas and two days old.

0960
Factual errors: In the movie it stated that the 23 chromosomes came from mars about a million years ago and set off the explosive growth on the planet earth. This is not true at all. Including their respective single pair of sex chromosomes humans and guppies each have 23 chromosome pairs having 46 actual chromosomes. Different organisms have a different number of chromosomes so sending 23 chromosomes to earth wouldn't have really started the 'explosive growth of life on the earth'. Ferns for example have over 1000 chromosome sets.
tp
Factual errors : In the movie it stated that the 23 chromosomes came from mars about a million years ago and set off the explosive growth on the planet earth. This is not true at all. Including their respective single pair of sex chromosomes , humans and guppies each have 23 chromosome pairs , having 46 actual chromosomes. Different organisms have a different number of chromosomes so sending 23 chromosomes to earth wouldn't have really started the 'explosive growth of life on the earth'. Ferns for example have over 1000 chromosome sets.
0961
Continuity: When Agent Strahm is looking at the list of victims and investigating detectives Daniel Matthews is listed as a victim but Daniel was found alive and in good health.
tp
Continuity : When Agent Strahm is looking at the list of victims and investigating detectives , Daniel Matthews is listed as a victim , but Daniel was found alive and in good health.
0962
Continuity: When Jonathan and Halley are in the apartment and the smoke alarm goes off Halley jumps up and Jonathan settles himself down on the bed unearthing the red Bloomingdales bag containing the glove. When you see the bag come into view Jon's holding a television remote in his left hand. When he picks up the bag and sits up the remote has switched to the right hand.
tp
Continuity : When Jonathan and Halley are in the apartment and the smoke alarm goes off , Halley jumps up , and Jonathan settles himself down on the bed , unearthing the red Bloomingdales bag containing the glove. When you see the bag come into view , Jon's holding a television remote in his left hand. When he picks up the bag and sits up , the remote has switched to the right hand.
0963
Continuity: When Rubin places the Polaroid photograph into his book he closes it so that he is looking at the cover. In the next shot as he puts the book down the cover is facing the floor and he is looking at the back.
tp
Continuity : When Rubin places the Polaroid photograph into his book , he closes it so that he is looking at the cover. In the next shot , as he puts the book down , the cover is facing the floor and he is looking at the back.

tp
Boom mic visible : Boom mic visible at bottom of screen when Mike and Rob are talking at the party in the Hills.

tp

0966
Factual errors: The argument Ali and his wife Sonji have over Ali's seeing Veronica Porche did not happen before the Ali/Foreman fight but instead happened before the 3rd Ali/Frazier fight "The Thrilla in in Manila" in 1975.
tp
Factual errors : The argument Ali and his wife Sonji have over Ali's seeing Veronica Porche did not happen before the Ali / Foreman fight , but instead happened before the 3rd Ali / Frazier fight , "The Thrilla in in Manila" , in 1975.

tp
Continuity : When Hitch is going to see how Julia kisses , on a wide shot he has the breath mints in his hands. Then in the next shot we see him pull the mints out of his pocket.
0968
Continuity: When Beth opens the cupboards to show Norman that there is no food she opens the left door and then the right and when she closes them the left door stays closed but the right one swings open a little bit. The camera cuts to Norman and when it cuts back to Beth the left door is open and the right one is closed.
tp
Continuity : When Beth opens the cupboards to show Norman that there is no food , she opens the left door and then the right , and when she closes them the left door stays closed but the right one swings open a little bit. The camera cuts to Norman , and when it cuts back to Beth the left door is open and the right one is closed.

0974
Quotes Manuela: Do you have any alcohol? Agrado: No I drank it all last night. Manuela: I meant for disinfecting.
fn
null
0975
Anachronisms: Among the several happy working and hunting dogs running around the Barton Park Estate one is very obviously a Golden Retriever. However the 'Flat Coat Golden Retriever' as we would recognize it today was not bred until the 1880's. The breed was first accepted by the The Kennel Club of England in 1903 and was not officially named 'Golden Retriever' until 1920 more than 100 years after the setting of the movie.
tp
Anachronisms : Among the several happy working and hunting dogs running around the Barton Park Estate , one is very obviously a Golden Retriever. However , the 'Flat Coat Golden Retriever' , as we would recognize it today , was not bred until the 1880's. The breed was first accepted by the The Kennel Club of England in 1903 , and was not officially named 'Golden Retriever' until 1920 , more than 100 years after the setting of the movie.
0976
Continuity: After Darry comes back from the pipe and has scared Trish just before it cuts to the next scene there is a shot of Trish next to the window on the window you can see spots of rain falling onto it. In the next shot while the two characters are driving away however it is not raining and the windows are completely dry.
tp
Continuity : After Darry comes back from the pipe and has scared Trish , just before it cuts to the next scene there is a shot of Trish next to the window , on the window you can see spots of rain falling onto it. In the next shot while the two characters are driving away however , it is not raining , and the windows are completely dry.
0977
Continuity: Elliot's McDonald's order includes a large drink but once outside the restaurant he clearly is holding a medium size drink.
tp
Continuity : Elliot's McDonald's order includes a large drink , but once outside the restaurant , he clearly is holding a medium size drink.

tp
Continuity : In the scene where the penguins steal the tour jeep , the tour guide has no gun yet he has one when the humans pick up the old lady after the penguins leave with the jeep.
0979
Factual errors: During the opening credits (after approx 4.5 minutes) a newspaper titled "Nouvélles de Monde" (French) appears. "Nouvelles" (news) is misspelled (there should be no accent). Moreover "Nouvelles de Monde" is not correct the adequate form is "Nouvelles du Monde"
tp
Factual errors : During the opening credits ( after approx 4.5 minutes ) a newspaper titled "Nouvélles de Monde" ( French ) appears. "Nouvelles" ( news ) is misspelled ( there should be no accent ) . Moreover "Nouvelles de Monde" is not correct , the adequate form is "Nouvelles du Monde"
0980
Factual errors: You cannot walk into a ballast tank from the accommodation areas. The tanks are not painted white on the inside and electric lights are not installed in ballast tanks. And finally when filling ballast tanks it is done through a pipe and a pump not by opening gigantic doors in the ship's hull.
tp
Factual errors : You cannot walk into a ballast tank from the accommodation areas. The tanks are not painted white on the inside , and electric lights are not installed in ballast tanks. And finally , when filling ballast tanks , it is done through a pipe and a pump , not by opening gigantic doors in the ship's hull.

Continuity : Applauding their win Michele Rodriguez' character increases her weapon positioned behind her arm ; in the following shot the weapon is positioned before her arm.

0991

0992
Factual errors: The closing credits list the wedding invitation lady as "Stationary Saleswoman" but "stationary" means "not moving". The word that means paper and envelopes is "stationery".
tp
Factual errors : The closing credits list the wedding invitation lady as "Stationary Saleswoman" , but "stationary" means "not moving". The word that means paper and envelopes is "stationery".
0993
Factual errors: (At 1:20:00) A scene depicts communist China stomping into the Holy Land. Unfortunately the identification of "China" was wrong in the film. (1) The flag shown was for ROC (the short-lived Republic of China founded by Dr. Sun Yat-sen defeated by the communists) which was not the communist China's flag. Communist China's flag is all red with a few yellow stars. The flag shown in the movie is red-white-blue. (2) The Chinese government names shown more than twice in the movie said "Republic of China (4 characters)" whereas it should have been "People's Republic of China (7 characters)".
tp
Factual errors : ( At 1 : 20 : 00 ) A scene depicts communist China stomping into the Holy Land. Unfortunately , the identification of "China" was wrong in the film. ( 1 ) The flag shown was for ROC ( the short - lived Republic of China , founded by Dr. Sun Yat - sen , defeated by the communists ), which was not the communist China's flag. Communist China's flag is all red with a few yellow stars. The flag shown in the movie is red - white - blue. ( 2 ) The Chinese government names , shown more than twice in the movie , said "Republic of China ( 4 characters ) " , whereas it should have been "People's Republic of China ( 7 characters ) ".
0994
Factual errors: When Sabine falls asleep in the car her head hits the centre of the steering wheel honking the horn. The horn on the model of Mini used is not in the centre of the steering wheel. Rather it is on the end of the turn indicator.
tp
Factual errors : When Sabine falls asleep in the car , her head hits the centre of the steering wheel honking the horn. The horn on the model of Mini used is not in the centre of the steering wheel. Rather , it is on the end of the turn indicator.
0995
Factual errors: On Good Friday in New York City all public schools are closed. None of the plot dealing with the two school children is possible on this date.
tp
Factual errors : On Good Friday in New York City all public schools are closed. None of the plot dealing with the two school children is possible on this date.
0996
Continuity: When Carol rushes into the house after contamination she has black stockings on her but when she enters the bathroom and gets undressed the stockings are white.
tp
Continuity : When Carol rushes into the house after contamination , she has black stockings on her , but when she enters the bathroom and gets undressed , the stockings are white.
0997
Factual errors: WWII German "dogtags" didn't have the name of the soldier on them. Instead they listed the unit that they were in when the tag was issued and a serial number.
tp
Factual errors : WWII German "dogtags" didn't have the name of the soldier on them. Instead they listed the unit that they were in when the tag was issued , and a serial number.
0998
Continuity: When Paul and Marcy first start having sex the camera shot is looking over Marcy's shoulder. When Paul asks her "You don't use condoms?" the bulk of Marcy's hair can be seen cascading down her back. Then the camera angle changes to a close-up of Marcy's face for her immediate reply "Don't worry I'm healthy." In this shot most of Marcy's hair is suddenly hanging over the left side of her face.
tp
Continuity : When Paul and Marcy first start having sex , the camera shot is looking over Marcy's shoulder. When Paul asks her , "You don't use condoms?" the bulk of Marcy's hair can be seen cascading down her back. Then the camera angle changes to a close - up of Marcy's face for her immediate reply , "Don't worry , I'm healthy." In this shot , most of Marcy's hair is suddenly hanging over the left side of her face.

tp

In the next shot which shows the remainder of the press conference on television Amelia is standing to the right of Adam. However the news camera's POV is different from that of the initial shot of the characters taking up position and Bly's positioning is not inconsistent.
tp
Incorrectly regarded as goofs : When Adam Lang emerges from the limousine to address the reporters , Amelia Bly crosses behind him and stands to the left. In the next shot , which shows the remainder of the press conference on television , Amelia is standing to the right of Adam. However the news camera's POV is different from that of the initial shot of the characters taking up position and Bly's positioning is not inconsistent.

1005
Revealing mistakes: When the Africans are loading up on fresh water an American ship cruises by with a long stream of water pouring from the side presumably discharge from a pump or engine. The discharge is near the water line it's not raining and the sea is calm. Even under those conditions the water on deck would flow over the side not form a long stream.
tp
Revealing mistakes : When the Africans are loading up on fresh water , an American ship cruises by with a long stream of water pouring from the side , presumably discharge from a pump or engine. The discharge is near the water line , it's not raining , and the sea is calm. Even under those conditions , the water on deck would flow over the side , not form a long stream.

1008
Continuity: Early in the film at one point the family returns home and it is snowing lightly. The windshield wipers stop and there is a brief overhead shot of Kate near the car with a lot of snow collected on the windshield. Not enough time had passed to allow that much snow to collect on the car.
tp
Continuity : Early in the film , at one point , the family returns home and it is snowing lightly. The windshield wipers stop and there is a brief overhead shot of Kate near the car with a lot of snow collected on the windshield. Not enough time had passed to allow that much snow to collect on the car.

1011
Factual errors: When Ernest runs through ER looking for a doctor a short scene shows a CPR in action. On the ECG monitor a flat line can be observed nonetheless the doctors try to revive the patient with an electric defibrillator. ECG flat line cannot be treated by defibrillation.
tp
Factual errors : When Ernest runs through ER looking for a doctor a short scene shows a CPR in action. On the ECG monitor a flat line can be observed , nonetheless the doctors try to revive the patient with an electric defibrillator. ECG flat line cannot be treated by defibrillation.

1017
Errors in geography: In the video montage of the beginning of their trip (played to MGMT's "Time to Pretend") you actually see shots of Indianapolis before you see shots of a popcorn bin in Boone County Indiana on the side of highway 65 south. This is incorrect because traveling south through Indiana you actually would go through Boone County before Marion county where Indianapolis is located.
tp
Errors in geography : In the video montage of the beginning of their trip ( played to MGMT's "Time to Pretend" ) you actually see shots of Indianapolis before you see shots of a popcorn bin in Boone County , Indiana on the side of highway 65 south. This is incorrect because traveling south through Indiana , you actually would go through Boone County before Marion county , where Indianapolis is located.
1018
Factual errors: Just before Lenny and Mace get into the "Millennium" party a screen shows people celebrating the new year in Madrid where it is still dark. This is not possible as the time in the movie is just after 11:00 p.m. which means that it is after 8:00 a.m. in Madrid
tp
Factual errors : Just before Lenny and Mace get into the "Millennium" party , a screen shows people celebrating the new year in Madrid , where it is still dark. This is not possible as the time in the movie is just after 11 : 00 p.m. , which means that it is after 8 : 00 a.m. in Madrid

tp
Continuity : The spoon in Kristina's ice - cream disappears and reappears between shots at the diner.
1020
Continuity: After her very fumbled sexual encounter in the car parked in the driveway Elena in windswept heavy rain returns to the party house to help her husband who has been violently sick in the downstairs toilet. Though she carried an opened umbrella her ankle length coat fully visible onscreen should have been absolutely soaked and there should have been other evidence of the heavy rain elsewhere on the coat. It was evidently completely dry.
tp
Continuity : After her very fumbled sexual encounter in the car parked in the driveway , Elena , in windswept heavy rain , returns to the party house to help her husband who has been violently sick in the downstairs toilet. Though she carried an opened umbrella , her ankle length coat , fully visible onscreen , should have been absolutely soaked and there should have been other evidence of the heavy rain elsewhere on the coat. It was evidently completely dry.

1022
Continuity: Clay puts one of his missing persons poster on the back of the Escalade and there's a close up shot of the poster as the vehicle drives away from the outpost store. The ensuing shot is of the vehicle entering the city limits of Crystal Lake passing by the sign however there's no poster on the back of the vehicle.
tp
Continuity : Clay puts one of his missing persons poster on the back of the Escalade and there's a close up shot of the poster as the vehicle drives away from the outpost store. The ensuing shot is of the vehicle entering the city limits of Crystal Lake , passing by the sign , however there's no poster on the back of the vehicle.
1023
Factual errors: Near the end of the movie when Tretiak is on the stage in Red Square to show that cold fusion is not possible many citizens in the rioting crowd are shown waving Ukrainian national flags. Tretiak refers to all of these people as Russians so this would not make sense. Not only that but the Soviet Union broke up well before the shooting of this movie and the time the film is set. Ukraine is an independent country and you would never see multiple Russian citizens waving Ukrainian flags.
tp
Factual errors : Near the end of the movie when Tretiak is on the stage in Red Square to show that cold fusion is not possible , many citizens in the rioting crowd are shown waving Ukrainian national flags. Tretiak refers to all of these people as Russians so this would not make sense. Not only that , but the Soviet Union broke up well before the shooting of this movie and the time the film is set. Ukraine is an independent country and you would never see multiple Russian citizens waving Ukrainian flags.

tp
Continuity : In one scene , Stone throws his wooden club to Elektra. In the next shot , he attacks Abby with his club which he didn't get it back.

1029
Continuity: When the Illyria team marches out on to the field at the Cornwall and Illyria game Duke is holding a flag in his right hand in the next shot the flag is in his left hand.
tp
Continuity : When the Illyria team marches out on to the field at the Cornwall and Illyria game , Duke is holding a flag in his right hand , in the next shot the flag is in his left hand.
1030
Continuity: When Tom breaks the window with a stone a Virgin Mary statue is visible behind it. The glass falls to pieces and the statue collapses to the floor. When the camera comes back to the window Virgin Mary is still standing there behind the broken window as nothing has happened.
tp
Continuity : When Tom breaks the window with a stone a Virgin Mary statue is visible behind it. The glass falls to pieces and the statue collapses to the floor. When the camera comes back to the window , Virgin Mary is still standing there , behind the broken window , as nothing has happened.
1031
Continuity: In the scene where the orphans are asleep in the music room Kitty can be seen holding one of the sleeping orphans. The orphan's head changes position between shots her head is initially tilted towards Kitty then tilting to the other side and finally looking straight up.
tp
Continuity : In the scene where the orphans are asleep in the music room , Kitty can be seen holding one of the sleeping orphans. The orphan's head changes position between shots , her head is initially tilted towards Kitty , then tilting to the other side , and finally looking straight up.
1032
Continuity: In the scene where Sokka and Katara are running from the cracking ice beneath them as Aang is emerging from the sea there is an overhead shot where Sokka is clearly surrounded by cracked ice and he's running on a large chunk of it. When the angle changes and he makes his next step he is on solid ice with the ice still cracking behind him.
tp
Continuity : In the scene where Sokka and Katara are running from the cracking ice beneath them as Aang is emerging from the sea , there is an overhead shot where Sokka is clearly surrounded by cracked ice and he's running on a large chunk of it. When the angle changes and he makes his next step he is on solid ice with the ice still cracking behind him.
1033
Errors in geography: When Craven is traveling to Union Street in Northampton he is seen turning right off of Market Street onto Bridge Street. This is in fact the wrong direction. Union Street is off of Market Street two blocks back. e is traveling in the wrong direction.
tp
Errors in geography : When Craven is traveling to Union Street in Northampton , he is seen turning right off of Market Street onto Bridge Street. This is in fact the wrong direction. Union Street is off of Market Street , two blocks back. e is traveling in the wrong direction.

1044
Revealing mistakes: When Chris Pratt calls Gary to arrange where to return the money he tells him to meet him at 6 AM meaning that it would be earlier than 6 AM when the call was placed. However it's already light out even though the sun does not rise in Kansas City until after 7:35 AM at the time of year the movie takes place (Christmas).
tp
Revealing mistakes : When Chris Pratt calls Gary to arrange where to return the money , he tells him to meet him at 6 AM , meaning that it would be earlier than 6 AM when the call was placed. However , it's already light out , even though the sun does not rise in Kansas City until after 7 : 35 AM at the time of year the movie takes place ( Christmas ) .
1045
Errors in geography: When Wayne is driving away in the sports car after the glass/chicken/melon crash he drives past a sign that says "Santa Barbara". Santa Barbara is in southern California many hundreds of miles from Aurora Illinois and would not be signposted that far away showing that the film is being shot in California rather than Illinois.
tp
Errors in geography : When Wayne is driving away in the sports car after the glass / chicken / melon crash , he drives past a sign that says "Santa Barbara". Santa Barbara is in southern California , many hundreds of miles from Aurora , Illinois , and would not be signposted that far away , showing that the film is being shot in California rather than Illinois.

1058
Factual errors: There is no damage at the site of the plane crash found by the hunters but the crash of a plane that size would leave a crater furrow or other significant damage. In addition the pilot is found near the plane but if he ejected he would have landed a long way away along the plane's trajectory.
tp
Factual errors : There is no damage at the site of the plane crash found by the hunters , but the crash of a plane that size would leave a crater , furrow , or other significant damage. In addition , the pilot is found near the plane , but if he ejected , he would have landed a long way away , along the plane's trajectory.

tp

1064

tp

1065
Errors made by characters (possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers): Trevor drops a light stick into a pit and asks Sean to time how long it takes to fall to the bottom. It takes three seconds and Trevor announces that that makes makes the pit "almost 200 feet" deep. The formula for the height an object falls in a given time is 0.5*g*t^2 (g=the force of gravity=32ft/s^2; t=time). This works out to a height of 144 feet for an object falling for three seconds which is hardly "almost 200 feet."
tp
Errors made by characters ( possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers ): Trevor drops a light stick into a pit and asks Sean to time how long it takes to fall to the bottom. It takes three seconds , and Trevor announces that that makes makes the pit "almost 200 feet" deep. The formula for the height an object falls in a given time is 0.5*g*t^2 ( g = the force of gravity = 32ft / s^2 ; t = time ) . This works out to a height of 144 feet for an object falling for three seconds , which is hardly "almost 200 feet."
1066

tp
Continuity : When Connie is having coffee at Café Noir with Tracy and Sally she heads to the back of the café ( the washroom ) without her purse. As she returns her purse is in hand.

Errors made by characters (possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers): Viktor writes "I love you Vic" on the hotel mirror. This should be "Vik".
tp
Errors made by characters ( possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers ): Viktor writes "I love you Vic" on the hotel mirror. This should be "Vik".
1068

tp

1069

1070
Continuity: When Zed is eating a kebab at Sodom it keeps changing from complete to eaten to separated to full again.
tp
Continuity : When Zed is eating a kebab at Sodom , it keeps changing from complete to eaten to separated to full again.
1071
Factual errors: The main character assumes his role because he found an old abandoned mail truck containing the remains of a long dead mailman and pilfered the uniform from the skeleton. The problem here is the condition of the clothing he takes. When a person dies the body goes through many stages of decomposition on its way to being merely a skeleton. As the tissues break down many chemicals and enzymes are released including the hydrochloric acid of the digestive system. In the final stages of decomposition this is referred to as liquefacation or liquiescence. Given enough time and a suitable environment this combination of byproducts with the addition of the bacteria that will inevitably emerge would make any cloth or fabric (with the exception of treated leather products) not only disgustingly filthy but also so weakened from exposure to what amounts to a corrosive liquid that the fibers would tear apart from any stresses put on them. Even the act of taking the jacket off of the remains (and certainly that of putting the jacket on himself) would have pulled the fabric apart.
tp
Factual errors : The main character assumes his role because he found an old abandoned mail truck containing the remains of a long dead mailman and pilfered the uniform from the skeleton. The problem here is the condition of the clothing he takes. When a person dies , the body goes through many stages of decomposition on its way to being merely a skeleton. As the tissues break down , many chemicals and enzymes are released , including the hydrochloric acid of the digestive system. In the final stages of decomposition , this is referred to as liquefacation or liquiescence. Given enough time and a suitable environment this combination of byproducts , with the addition of the bacteria that will inevitably emerge , would make any cloth or fabric ( with the exception of treated leather products ) not only disgustingly filthy , but also so weakened from exposure to what amounts to a corrosive liquid , that the fibers would tear apart from any stresses put on them. Even the act of taking the jacket off of the remains ( and certainly that of putting the jacket on himself ) would have pulled the fabric apart.
1072
Revealing mistakes: In several frontal shots of the Griswolds driving along there is no windshield on their car.
tp
Revealing mistakes : In several frontal shots of the Griswolds driving along , there is no windshield on their car.
1073
Continuity: At the end of the movie the Elvis Presley imitator gets knocked down and attached to a prison cell with handcuffs. But after that he suddenly is on the loose.
tp
Continuity : At the end of the movie the Elvis Presley imitator gets knocked down and attached to a prison cell with handcuffs. But after that he suddenly is on the loose.
1074
Continuity: In the segment 'Père-Lachaise' when William (Rufus Sewell) confronts Frances (Emily Mortimer) his coat is buttoned to the neck. The camera cuts to Frances and back to William his coat now open. The next time William appears his coat is buttoned-up again. William (apparently) hasn't moved at all.
tp
Continuity : In the segment 'Père - Lachaise , ' when William ( Rufus Sewell ) confronts Frances ( Emily Mortimer ), his coat is buttoned to the neck. The camera cuts to Frances , and back to William , his coat now open. The next time William appears , his coat is buttoned - up again. William ( apparently ) hasn't moved at all.
1075
Continuity: After CMDCM Urgayle (Viggo Mortensen) is shot in combat he is seen with an elbow crutch before congratulating his trainees. However this elbow crutch seems to disappear as he is seen using both hands (one to hand out the CRT qualification insignia the other to shake hands) right after without the support of someone or otherwise ridding himself of the elbow crutch.
tp
Continuity : After CMDCM Urgayle ( Viggo Mortensen ), is shot in combat , he is seen with an elbow crutch before congratulating his trainees. However , this elbow crutch seems to disappear as he is seen using both hands ( one to hand out the CRT qualification insignia , the other to shake hands ) right after , without the support of someone , or otherwise ridding himself of the elbow crutch.
1076
Continuity: Susan and Daniel's snorkels change from the left side to the right side of their heads and back several times (divers always wear them on the left).
tp
Continuity : Susan and Daniel's snorkels change from the left side to the right side of their heads and back several times ( divers always wear them on the left ) .
1077
Anachronisms: The red and white Ohio license plate on Toby's station wagon was actually in use during the years of 1976-1979. Since he was going to see Revenge of the Nerds the correct Ohio license plate would have been blue lettering on a white background which was issued during 1980-1984.
tp
Anachronisms : The red and white Ohio license plate on Toby's station wagon was actually in use during the years of 1976 - 1979. Since he was going to see Revenge of the Nerds , the correct Ohio license plate would have been blue lettering on a white background which was issued during 1980 - 1984.
1078
Factual errors: Coop is inspired to become a "big sports star" when he catches Reggie Jackson's third home run ball in the World Series. Reggie Jackson's third home run ball was hit into the center field "batter's eye" where no fans are allowed.
tp
Factual errors : Coop is inspired to become a "big sports star" when he catches Reggie Jackson's third home run ball in the World Series. Reggie Jackson's third home run ball was hit into the center field "batter's eye" where no fans are allowed.
1079
Continuity: When Juni handcuffs his arm to a metal case the handcuff switches back and forth from his right arm to his left arm.
tp
Continuity : When Juni handcuffs his arm to a metal case , the handcuff switches back and forth from his right arm to his left arm.
1080
Anachronisms: The slide of the Sistine Chapel in Katherine's Christmas present is a photo of the Chapel ceiling after it was restored in the 1990s.
tp
Anachronisms : The slide of the Sistine Chapel in Katherine's Christmas present is a photo of the Chapel ceiling after it was restored in the 1990s.
1081

They knock down some of it from the top but some on the sides and top is still there. It disappears when they go through. (The 91 minute version does not show how they first get into the church.)

Continuity : When the boys are breaking into the church there is some glass still attached to the sides of the window. They knock down some of it from the top , but some on the sides and top is still there. It disappears when they go through. ( The 91 minute version does not show how they first get into the church. )
1082
Factual errors: Though it is true that volcanic activity can turn lakes and other bodies of water around the volcano acidic. But the acid would not burn through the boat as quickly as depicted in the movie.
tp
Factual errors : Though , it is true that volcanic activity can turn lakes and other bodies of water around the volcano acidic. But , the acid would not burn through the boat as quickly as depicted in the movie.
1083
Factual errors: After visiting the office of the murdered victim the two investigators go to the Officer's Club for a drink. They look around the room and there is a non-commissioned officer (E-7) in the club fraternizing with the commissioned officers. This would never have been allowed in an officers' club nor would it likely have occurred off of the base with officers and enlisted men still in uniform.
tp
Factual errors : After visiting the office of the murdered victim , the two investigators go to the Officer's Club for a drink. They look around the room and there is a non - commissioned officer ( E - 7 ) in the club fraternizing with the commissioned officers. This would never have been allowed in an officers' club nor would it likely have occurred off of the base with officers and enlisted men still in uniform.
1084
Errors made by characters (possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers): Max and Fanny are supposed to be the same age but the actors playing them are in fact 11 years apart.
tp
Errors made by characters ( possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers ): Max and Fanny are supposed to be the same age , but the actors playing them are , in fact , 11 years apart.
1085
Factual errors: One sequence of a United States Air Force Strategic Air Command B-52 Stratofortress shows it to be armed with four Douglas AGM-48A Skybolt air-launched ballistic missiles. This weapons system was in development in 1962 and would be recommended for cancellation by Secretary of Defense Robert McNamara on 21 November 1962. President Kennedy concurred and the project was canceled in December 1962 having never entered operational service.
tp
Factual errors : One sequence of a United States Air Force Strategic Air Command B - 52 Stratofortress shows it to be armed with four Douglas AGM - 48A Skybolt air - launched ballistic missiles. This weapons system was in development in 1962 , and would be recommended for cancellation by Secretary of Defense Robert McNamara on 21 November 1962. President Kennedy concurred , and the project was canceled in December 1962 , having never entered operational service.

He makes a call to Isabella in Chicago , United States when he apologizes for not calling her earlier. Cape Town is 8 hours ahead of Chicago , it would have been pitch dark in Chicago at that time but Isabella is outside in the midday sun playing soccer with Jeremy.

Continuity: The golf club is missing from Adam's Boxster in the scene where he is on the phone and driving home. It reappears as he arrives at his driveway.
tp
Continuity : The golf club is missing from Adam's Boxster in the scene where he is on the phone and driving home. It reappears as he arrives at his driveway.
1104
Revealing mistakes: [20th Anniversary edition] When E.T. is eating potato salad and drinking beer in front of the refrigerator during the scene when he is alone at home the shadow of his head cast on the fridge door is that of the original puppet not the CGI head.
tp
Revealing mistakes : [ 20th Anniversary edition ] When E.T. is eating potato salad and drinking beer in front of the refrigerator during the scene when he is alone at home , the shadow of his head cast on the fridge door is that of the original puppet , not the CGI head.
1105
Incorrectly regarded as goofs: It is revealed in the movie that Rage can be passed on from man to animal or animal to man and by means of biting or blood of the infected landing in the victims mouth eyes or nose. We never see any infected dogs or birds of prey on the loose in the movie but this makes sense because the virus might very well require a host more closely related to humans like the chimps from which the outbreak originally began. This is reinforced when we see the horses that are not infected.
tp
Incorrectly regarded as goofs : It is revealed in the movie that Rage can be passed on from man to animal or animal to man , and by means of biting , or blood of the infected landing in the victims mouth , eyes or nose. We never see any infected dogs or birds of prey on the loose in the movie , but this makes sense because the virus might very well require a host more closely related to humans , like the chimps from which the outbreak originally began. This is reinforced when we see the horses that are not infected.
1106
Anachronisms: When Chris is viewing the buildings of downtown L.A. a Union Bank of California building is shown. Union Bank of California was formed in 1996 while the film depicts events from 1992.
tp
Anachronisms : When Chris is viewing the buildings of downtown L.A. , a Union Bank of California building is shown. Union Bank of California was formed in 1996 , while the film depicts events from 1992.
1107
Errors in geography: When David and his parents are at the breakfast table a carton of Clover-Stornetta milk is on the table. The film is set in New York; that brand is only sold in parts of California.
tp
Errors in geography : When David and his parents are at the breakfast table , a carton of Clover - Stornetta milk is on the table. The film is set in New York ; that brand is only sold in parts of California.
1108
Revealing mistakes: When Susan and Lucy are riding on Aslan's back to the castle he is traveling at a great speed but they are sitting upright and their hair is hanging down as if they were sitting still.
tp
Revealing mistakes : When Susan and Lucy are riding on Aslan's back to the castle , he is traveling at a great speed , but they are sitting upright and their hair is hanging down as if they were sitting still.
1109
Continuity: In the beginning of the movie Howard is in his office there is a window shot showing daylight. When Howard leaves the office in his truck just moments later it is dark outside.
tp
Continuity : In the beginning of the movie , Howard is in his office , there is a window shot showing daylight. When Howard leaves the office in his truck , just moments later , it is dark outside.
1110
Continuity: In a scene near the beginning of the film after Highsmith and Danson come in with their metals the camera show Hoitz get up from his computer which has solitaire on it. The cards look like it's in the middle of a game. He gets up and the camera changes. When it shows his computer again a few seconds later the cards have changed and it looked like he just started a new game.
tp
Continuity : In a scene near the beginning of the film , after Highsmith and Danson come in with their metals , the camera show Hoitz get up from his computer which has solitaire on it. The cards look like it's in the middle of a game. He gets up and the camera changes. When it shows his computer again a few seconds later the cards have changed and it looked like he just started a new game.
1111
Continuity: When Michael is talking to the room full of brokers to tell them about the party his tie pin is alternately closed/open between shots.
tp
Continuity : When Michael is talking to the room full of brokers to tell them about the party , his tie pin is alternately closed / open between shots.
1112
Continuity: After Mari hits Krug with the rock she can clearly be seen running away with her shoes ON. Later after she is shot swimming away from her attackers we are shown a close up of her foot with her shoes OFF.
tp
Continuity : After Mari hits Krug with the rock , she can clearly be seen running away with her shoes ON. Later , after she is shot swimming away from her attackers , we are shown a close up of her foot with her shoes OFF.
1113
Revealing mistakes: When the camera tracks in on Schecter in the control room in the haunted house there are two very conspicuously CG-added Blockbuster video boxes under some paper. They wobble as the camera moves closer to them.
tp
Revealing mistakes : When the camera tracks in on Schecter in the control room in the haunted house , there are two very conspicuously CG - added Blockbuster video boxes under some paper. They wobble as the camera moves closer to them.
1114
Errors made by characters (possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers): Samir crosses into the United States from or at Boundary Bay. This would be very close to the worst place to cross from Canada into the United States. The border crossing is the only access to a peninsula which contains the hamlet of Point Roberts with a population of several thousand. To access the rest of the States Samir would have to rent a boat and go be sea to Bellingham or Blaine or he could go back into Canada by road.
tp
Errors made by characters ( possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers ): Samir crosses into the United States from or at Boundary Bay. This would be very close to the worst place to cross from Canada into the United States. The border crossing is the only access to a peninsula which contains the hamlet of Point Roberts with a population of several thousand. To access the rest of the States , Samir would have to rent a boat and go be sea to Bellingham or Blaine , or he could go back into Canada by road.
1115
Crew or equipment visible: A crew member is reflected in the car window when César picks up Pelayo for tennis.
tp
Crew or equipment visible : A crew member is reflected in the car window when César picks up Pelayo for tennis.
1116
Crew or equipment visible: When Mick appears with his truck to help the three stranded backpackers to the left of Ben you can see the legs of a crewmember and the shadow he/she is casting.
tp
Crew or equipment visible : When Mick appears with his truck to help the three stranded backpackers , to the left of Ben , you can see the legs of a crewmember , and the shadow he / she is casting.
1117
Factual errors: While discussing their nervousness about their budding relationship the President (Michael Douglas) tells the lobbyist (Annette Benning) that all the other first ladies were married to their husbands before they came to the White House. However Grover Cleveland was a bachelor when he was first elected in 1884. He did marry Frances Folsom in the White House in 1886.
tp
Factual errors : While discussing their nervousness about their budding relationship , the President ( Michael Douglas ) tells the lobbyist ( Annette Benning ) that all the other first ladies were married to their husbands before they came to the White House. However Grover Cleveland was a bachelor when he was first elected in 1884. He did marry Frances Folsom in the White House in 1886.
1118
Factual errors: At several points real-life quotes from George W. Bush are used in very different contexts. For example he is shown saying "Rarely is the question asked 'Is our children learning?'" during his Texas gubernatorial run. He actually said it in January 2000.
tp
Factual errors : At several points , real - life quotes from George W. Bush are used in very different contexts. For example , he is shown saying "Rarely is the question asked 'Is our children learning?'" during his Texas gubernatorial run. He actually said it in January 2000.
1119
Anachronisms: In the scene that shows scenes of Radio City and then New York City on December 29 1989 there is a picture of a New York City Police Officer with a dark blue uniform shirt. New York City Police Officers wore light blue uniform shirts at that time.
tp
Anachronisms : In the scene that shows scenes of Radio City and then New York City on December 29 , 1989 , there is a picture of a New York City Police Officer with a dark blue uniform shirt. New York City Police Officers wore light blue uniform shirts at that time.
1120
Continuity: When you first see the Truck carrying the pipes which the view is from the back of the truck looking forward you can see two stacks of pipes on the back of the truck. But when you see a shot of the truck later there is only one stack of pipes.
tp
Continuity : When you first see the Truck carrying the pipes which the view is from the back of the truck looking forward you can see two stacks of pipes on the back of the truck. But when you see a shot of the truck later there is only one stack of pipes.
1121
Factual errors: In the film the character shows all signs of schizophrenia; not bipolar disorder (formerly known as "manic-depressive disorder") as is claimed in the film. Furthermore David Helfgott in person displays many symptoms of schizophrenia and none of bipolar disorder.
tp
Factual errors : In the film , the character shows all signs of schizophrenia ; not bipolar disorder ( formerly known as "manic - depressive disorder" ), as is claimed in the film. Furthermore , David Helfgott , in person , displays many symptoms of schizophrenia and none of bipolar disorder.
1122
Continuity: In the flashback scene when Ben (as a child) knocks on the foreign exchange student's door to return her panties she is shown with a towel wrapped around her head in the first shot then with her wet blond hair hanging down (you can just see the ends) in the second shot then in the third shot just when she is about to close the door the towel is back.
tp
Continuity : In the flashback scene when Ben ( as a child ) knocks on the foreign exchange student's door to return her panties , she is shown with a towel wrapped around her head in the first shot , then with her wet blond hair hanging down ( you can just see the ends ) in the second shot , then in the third shot just when she is about to close the door the towel is back.
1123
Continuity: When Jessica tells Liu what is happening to her and how she got in the position she is in mid-way through the movie her hair instantly changes position.
tp
Continuity : When Jessica tells Liu what is happening to her and how she got in the position she is in , mid - way through the movie , her hair instantly changes position.
1124
Revealing mistakes: When Jacques 'Le Coq' Grande walks in to serve his special Quebec pizza his top lifts up to show his stomach and you can clearly see parts of the stuffing sticking out from the top of his Speedo.
tp
Revealing mistakes : When Jacques 'Le Coq' Grande walks in to serve his special Quebec pizza , his top lifts up to show his stomach and you can clearly see parts of the stuffing sticking out from the top of his Speedo.
1125
Continuity: When Mac discovers Tyler is dancing at the school for the first time and they go outside Mac's shirt is buttoned on the lowest button. It then switches to being buttoned on the second lowest button and then back to the lowest button.
tp
Continuity : When Mac discovers Tyler is dancing at the school for the first time and they go outside , Mac's shirt is buttoned on the lowest button. It then switches to being buttoned on the second lowest button , and then back to the lowest button.
1126
Continuity: Sil is in the process of removing the swimwear from the "hot tub guy" when the good guys show up to get her. But after she notices they arrived for her the swim short on the guy seems to have been pulled back up to the guy's waist.
tp
Continuity : Sil is in the process of removing the swimwear from the "hot tub guy" when the good guys show up to get her. But after she notices they arrived for her , the swim short on the guy seems to have been pulled back up to the guy's waist.
1127

tp
Errors made by characters ( possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers ): When Anna is in the confessional , the priest forgets to give her absolution at the end of her confession , though he gives her penance.
1128
Continuity: During Edith's first date with Marcel a sommelier comes from Marcel's right. Marcel tastes the wine looks to his left and tells the waiter that the wine is OK.
tp
Continuity : During Edith's first date with Marcel , a sommelier comes from Marcel's right. Marcel tastes the wine , looks to his left , and tells the waiter that the wine is OK.
1129
Anachronisms: In the opening scene when the family is listening to the car radio we hear the music station announce that they're playing "music from the 70's 80's 90's and today!" even though the movie is based in the 80's.
tp
Anachronisms : In the opening scene , when the family is listening to the car radio , we hear the music station announce that they're playing "music from the 70's , 80's , 90's and today!" even though the movie is based in the 80's.
1130
Factual errors: When Major Cavazos appears in in dress uniform the brim of his hat is decorated with gold braid. As a major his hat would not have this decoration.
tp
Factual errors : When Major Cavazos appears in in dress uniform , the brim of his hat is decorated with gold braid. As a major , his hat would not have this decoration.
1131
Continuity: After Ed's real father dies and he arrives at the hospital his mother is coming down the hallway wearing high-heeled shoes. After she gives Ed a hug she has flat shoes on.
tp
Continuity : After Ed's real father dies and he arrives at the hospital , his mother is coming down the hallway wearing high - heeled shoes. After she gives Ed a hug she has flat shoes on.
1132
Continuity: The young Benjamín Esposito is left-handed - you can see it when he is writing some notes at the office regarding Isidoro's letters. Old Esposito is on the contrary right-handed (check out the very beginning of the movie when he's starting to write his essay).
tp
Continuity : The young Benjamín Esposito is left - handed - you can see it when he is writing some notes at the office , regarding Isidoro's letters. Old Esposito is , on the contrary , right - handed ( check out the very beginning of the movie , when he's starting to write his essay ) .
1133
Continuity: During the "fight play" on Shane's first play in the final game the referee (in the white hat) is broadcasting the penalties over the PA system. In the close-up of Shane smiling the referee is behind him in the backfield area where he is always stationed during a play.
tp
Continuity : During the "fight play" on Shane's first play in the final game , the referee ( in the white hat ) is broadcasting the penalties over the PA system. In the close - up of Shane smiling , the referee is behind him in the backfield area , where he is always stationed during a play.
1134
Continuity: During the land race scene Joseph is carrying his flag on the back of his horse. The flag disappears and reappears between shots.
tp
Continuity : During the land race scene , Joseph is carrying his flag on the back of his horse. The flag disappears and reappears between shots.
1135
Errors in geography: In the beginning of the movie the captioning says they are at the US Consulate in Dubai but they are actually at the One & Only Ocean Club Resort on Paradise Island in the Bahamas. The consulate in Dubai is a skyscraper not the villa we see.
fp
Errors in geography : In the beginning of the movie , the captioning says they are at the US Consulate in Dubai , but they are actually at the One & Only Ocean Club Resort on Paradise Island in the Bahamas. The consulate in Dubai is a skyscraper , not the villa we see.
1136
Continuity: While on the subway looking at Finn's sketch book the blood on Lustig's fingers changes in amount and placement throughout the scene.
tp
Continuity : While on the subway looking at Finn's sketch book , the blood on Lustig's fingers changes in amount and placement throughout the scene.
1137

tp

1138
Plot holes: Live tree roots are shown in the sewer even though super-heated fire had twice blasted through it.
tp
Plot holes : Live tree roots are shown in the sewer even though super - heated fire had twice blasted through it.
1139
Continuity: Supposedly set in winter in New York yet scenes simultaneously feature snow and fully leaved deciduous trees.
tp
Continuity : Supposedly set in winter in New York , yet scenes simultaneously feature snow and fully leaved deciduous trees.
1140
Continuity: When Joe blows Surat's aide by a grenade in the climax scene we see the body of the man splits in two. Next shot is of the room door exploding due to the grenade blast. Then again we see the man's body splitting in half. The torso flies off over Joe and the limb portion remains in front of him. In the next shot both the torso and limb parts disappear and Joe goes inside the room.
tp
Continuity : When Joe blows Surat's aide by a grenade in the climax scene , we see the body of the man splits in two. Next shot is of the room door exploding due to the grenade blast. Then again we see the man's body splitting in half. The torso flies off over Joe and the limb portion remains in front of him. In the next shot both the torso and limb parts disappear and Joe goes inside the room.
1141
Continuity: Axel has Janice put the blueprint in his suit when he takes the suit off Axel takes the blueprint out of his back pocket of his jeans. There is no way he could have moved it with the suit on.
tp
Continuity : Axel has Janice put the blueprint in his suit , when he takes the suit off , Axel takes the blueprint out of his back pocket of his jeans. There is no way he could have moved it with the suit on.
1142
Continuity: When the captain takes a drink he takes the bottle cap off and sets it beside the bottle on the right side of the desk and pours his drink. In the next instant the cap is in his left hand as he caps the bottle.
tp
Continuity : When the captain takes a drink , he takes the bottle cap off and sets it beside the bottle on the right side of the desk and pours his drink. In the next instant the cap is in his left hand as he caps the bottle.

1144

fp
Continuity : The bike that Renato rides , suddenly has a modern derailleur - type chain tensioner at the rear at about 20 - 21 minutes into the film. At all other times , his bike has a fixed rear gear without the chain tensioner.
1145
Errors in geography: Sometimes the sound of a cable car bell can be heard in Sara's neighborhood or apartment. There are no cable cars in that part of San Francisco and therefore no cable car bells.
tp
Errors in geography : Sometimes the sound of a cable car bell can be heard in Sara's neighborhood or apartment. There are no cable cars in that part of San Francisco , and therefore no cable car bells.
1146
Revealing mistakes: In the hospital scene when the bath is overflowing there is a massive amount of water pouring out of the bath but only a small stream going into it from the tap. It would be impossible for more water to be coming out of the bath than going in.
tp
Revealing mistakes : In the hospital scene when the bath is overflowing , there is a massive amount of water pouring out of the bath , but only a small stream going into it from the tap. It would be impossible for more water to be coming out of the bath than going in.
1147

tp

1148
Continuity: After Vaughan repeatedly crashes the left front bumper of his Lincoln into a junker James Ballard is sitting in causing major damage to the bumper and the lights Vaughan is soon shown driving on the highway with no damage to the bumper and both left lights operational.
tp
Continuity : After Vaughan repeatedly crashes the left front bumper of his Lincoln into a junker James Ballard is sitting in , causing major damage to the bumper and the lights , Vaughan is soon shown driving on the highway with no damage to the bumper and both left lights operational.
1149
Continuity: When the dog which is 'eaten' by the house first appears it squats to pee in the manner of a female dog. At the end of the movie when it appears again it hikes its leg up and pees as a male dog. The dog is referenced in the credits as "Kevin".
tp
Continuity : When the dog which is 'eaten' by the house first appears , it squats to pee in the manner of a female dog. At the end of the movie , when it appears again , it hikes its leg up and pees as a male dog. The dog is referenced in the credits as "Kevin".

tp
