1176
Anachronisms: Joy Division is shown performing "Transmission" on Tony Wilson's television show in September 1978 but in reality they performed "Shadowplay". The performance that is represented in this scene actually took place a year later in September 1979 on the BBC2 program "Something Else" when they performed "Transmission" (a performance which was used as the music video for the song) and "She's Lost Control".
tp
Anachronisms : Joy Division is shown performing "Transmission" on Tony Wilson's television show in September 1978 , but in reality , they performed "Shadowplay". The performance that is represented in this scene actually took place a year later in September 1979 on the BBC2 program "Something Else" , when they performed "Transmission" ( a performance which was used as the music video for the song ) and "She's Lost Control".
1177
Crew or equipment visible: The helicopter carrying the camera is visible on the mirrored windows of the first building in the opening shot.
tp
Crew or equipment visible : The helicopter carrying the camera is visible on the mirrored windows of the first building in the opening shot.
1178
Factual errors: In the credits for the song "Start Wearing Purple" Eugene Hutz's band is credited as both "Gogol Bordello" (correct spelling) and "Gogol Bodello" (incorrect spelling dropped "r").
tp
Factual errors : In the credits for the song "Start Wearing Purple , " Eugene Hutz 's band is credited as both " Gogol Bordello " ( correct spelling ) and "Gogol Bodello" ( incorrect spelling , dropped "r" ) .
1179

tp
Audio / visual unsynchronized : When John Smith is talking to Strozzi's girlfriend in the car in front of Slim's he asks her a question. His lips are obviously not moving when he asks the question.

1181
Revealing mistakes: When Wade's parents enter the living room to see what was stolen the window is intact even though Don had broken it earlier when he was robbing the house. There is no way there was enough time to fix the window in time.
tp
Revealing mistakes : When Wade's parents enter the living room to see what was stolen , the window is intact , even though Don had broken it earlier when he was robbing the house. There is no way there was enough time to fix the window in time.
1182
Crew or equipment visible: During the rescue toward the end of the movie when a rocket is fired from the Urban Assault Vehicle toward a guard tower a crew member is clearly visible crouching at the left of the scene attempting to conceal himself behind part of a building.
tp

1183
Incorrectly regarded as goofs: When Paul interrogates Raul Raul breathes on the mirror-glass so it becomes hazy. Some people think that Jimmy draws a figure in the haze on the other side of the glass though his side must be dry but before he starts to draw he is seen breathing himself on his side of the mirror-glass.
tp
Incorrectly regarded as goofs : When Paul interrogates Raul , Raul breathes on the mirror - glass , so it becomes hazy. Some people think that Jimmy draws a figure in the haze on the other side of the glass , though his side must be dry , but before he starts to draw , he is seen breathing himself on his side of the mirror - glass.
1184
Revealing mistakes: When Ian lowers the curtain during the concert he pulls the rope down. This curtain system actually requires the operator to push the rope upwards to lower the curtain (counterweight system).
tp
Revealing mistakes : When Ian lowers the curtain during the concert he pulls the rope down. This curtain system actually requires the operator to push the rope upwards to lower the curtain ( counterweight system ) .
1185
Continuity: As Toby is packing his backpack he pulls out the dog encyclopedia and puts it on top but a moment later it is gone then back again.
tp

1186
Revealing mistakes: The parrot Dick is able to fly around the Duplex but in close-up shots it is apparent that the bird's wings are clipped.
tp

1187
Revealing mistakes: When Lt. Henry Oak is first seen his jacket is off revealing his shoulder holster rig. He is carrying a .357 magnum revolver but the holster rig is made for a semiautomatic. The strap on the side opposite the pistol contains a case for a semiautomatic magazine.
tp
Revealing mistakes : When Lt. Henry Oak is first seen , his jacket is off , revealing his shoulder holster rig. He is carrying a .357 magnum revolver , but the holster rig is made for a semiautomatic. The strap on the side opposite the pistol contains a case for a semiautomatic magazine.
1188
Continuity: In the opening scene at the gas station Michelle is wearing heeled black boots but when she leaves the gas station feet with different shoes are shown in the close-up of the pedals (which are the pedals of a much older vehicle). The shot is taken from later in the film.
tp
Continuity : In the opening scene at the gas station , Michelle is wearing heeled black boots , but when she leaves the gas station , feet with different shoes are shown in the close - up of the pedals ( which are the pedals of a much older vehicle ) . The shot is taken from later in the film.
1189
Continuity: When Benny's fly ball knocks Scotty Smalls down (at 07:07) the camera switches from Scotty to a shot of the rest of the boys laughing (from 07:08 to 07:11) as the catcher Ham at home plate walking toward 1st drops his glove (at 07:10) and starts to reach down (at 07:11) as the glove rolls away from him. But the next shot showing Ham Squints Benny and Yeah-Yeah (from 07:12 to 07:13) starts with Ham already standing upright with his glove on his left hand looking out to left field (where Scotty has fallen) and then raising his mask with his right hand.
tp
Continuity : When Benny's fly ball knocks Scotty Smalls down ( at 07 : 07 ), the camera switches from Scotty to a shot of the rest of the boys laughing ( from 07 : 08 to 07 : 11 ), as the catcher , Ham , at home plate walking toward 1st , drops his glove ( at 07 : 10 ) and starts to reach down ( at 07 : 11 ) as the glove rolls away from him. But the next shot , showing Ham , Squints , Benny , and Yeah - Yeah ( from 07 : 12 to 07 : 13 ), starts with Ham already standing upright with his glove on his left hand , looking out to left field ( where Scotty has fallen ) and then raising his mask with his right hand.

Her fringe is first on the sides of her face then in the next shot it's pulled back to her ponytail then back again on the sides in the next shot.
tp
Continuity : When Catherine and her father take dinner and they are talking about how many days she missed by being lazy , her hair position alternates from a shot to another. Her fringe is first on the sides of her face , then in the next shot it's pulled back to her ponytail , then back again on the sides in the next shot.

1212
Anachronisms: As Howard's car is seen driving over a bridge on his way to New York for his new job at WNBC David Bowie's "Let's Dance" is playing. Howard's first official day at WNBC was September 6 1982 so obviously he had to arrive in New York around that date. However "Let's Dance" was not released until March 17 1983.
tp
Anachronisms : As Howard's car is seen driving over a bridge , on his way to New York for his new job at WNBC , David Bowie's "Let's Dance" is playing. Howard's first official day at WNBC was September 6 , 1982 so obviously he had to arrive in New York around that date. However , "Let's Dance" was not released until March 17 , 1983.

Errors in geography: There were no Esso stations in California at that time. They were known as Enco stations in that state.

1222

1223
Factual errors: When discussing Kodiak bears Styles says that they are highly aggressive readily attacking and killing people without provocation. In fact Kodiak bears are very shy and when they encounter human beings they typically withdraw. (Attacks do occur but they are quite rare and almost never fatal.)
tp
Factual errors : When discussing Kodiak bears , Styles says that they are highly aggressive , readily attacking and killing people without provocation. In fact , Kodiak bears are very shy , and when they encounter human beings , they typically withdraw. ( Attacks do occur , but they are quite rare and almost never fatal. )
1224
Continuity: When Dr. Marshall first sees the imprint that his lighter made in a rock the lettering from the lighter can be seen imprinted on it in stone. Later when the T-rex actually steps on the lighter the lettering is facing upward making it impossible to make an imprint on the rock.
tp
Continuity : When Dr. Marshall first sees the imprint that his lighter made in a rock , the lettering from the lighter can be seen imprinted on it in stone. Later when the T - rex actually steps on the lighter , the lettering is facing upward making it impossible to make an imprint on the rock.
1225
Quotes Pops: [after Calvin suddenly walks into the living room] Hey man you can't be just popping up like that without warning! For a moment I thought you were Chucky.Bout to... put you in a choke hold!
fp
Continuity : When Darryl is looking at the video Pops made with the teddy bear , the angle of the camera / bear would make it seem like it was at shoulder height or higher. When Darryl finds the bear , it is on a chair. That would have given the video a much lower angle.
1226
Audio/visual unsynchronized: About halfway through the movie Sasha says she is thirsty however her lips do not move.
tp
Audio / visual unsynchronized : About halfway through the movie , Sasha says she is thirsty , however , her lips do not move.
1227
Continuity: The headrests in Cliff and Cydney's Jeep are missing during interior shots then reappear during long exterior shots. Removing headrests from seats has been a common practice in movies for decades in order to provide more visibility while filming inside automobiles. This can usually be spotted by the two mounting holes at the top of the seat which are visible once the headrests have been removed.
tp
Continuity : The headrests in Cliff and Cydney's Jeep are missing during interior shots then reappear during long exterior shots. Removing headrests from seats has been a common practice in movies for decades in order to provide more visibility while filming inside automobiles. This can usually be spotted by the two mounting holes at the top of the seat which are visible once the headrests have been removed.

Continuity: The first time we see the Chidducks and Robin together her hair near her left ear.
tp
Continuity : The first time we see the Chidducks and Robin together , her hair near her left ear.

tp
Incorrectly regarded as goofs : When Gorgeous George goes into the hotel room at the Prudential , one of the mobsters says , "Jimmy the Gofer , la cortina" ( the curtain ) . "La cortina" means "the curtain" in both Italian and Spanish.

When the camera angle switches to the front there is a noticeable lock of hair hanging in front of his face. The camera switches back to the side view and his hair is styled entirely back from his face again.

1256
Revealing mistakes: In the sequence where we meet the Gornicke's for the first time Billy's right front tooth is only about a quarter of the way grown in. When he meets Bob in the Bathroom later that night the same tooth is about halfway grown in. When they leave the next day it's all the way grown in. Thus that sequence must have actually taken a couple of weeks or so to shoot.
tp
Revealing mistakes : In the sequence where we meet the Gornicke's for the first time , Billy's right front tooth is only about a quarter of the way grown in. When he meets Bob in the Bathroom later that night , the same tooth is about halfway grown in. When they leave the next day , it's all the way grown in. Thus , that sequence must have actually taken a couple of weeks or so to shoot.
1257
Continuity: When Laure/Lily strips for Bardo in the bar her stockings suddenly disappear from her legs while she still wears boots.
tp
Continuity : When Laure / Lily strips for Bardo in the bar her stockings suddenly disappear from her legs while she still wears boots.
1258
Crew or equipment visible: During the dance scene with George and Charley while the song "Green Onions" is playing you can see a crew member in the mirror.
tp
Crew or equipment visible : During the dance scene with George and Charley , while the song "Green Onions" is playing , you can see a crew member in the mirror.
1259
Continuity: When Norah chases after the kitten there is a small table and a cat statue on the porch. Later when the house is burning at night the table and statue are gone. A subsequent scene of the porch in flames has the table and cat statue back again.
tp
Continuity : When Norah chases after the kitten , there is a small table and a cat statue on the porch. Later , when the house is burning at night , the table and statue are gone. A subsequent scene of the porch in flames has the table and cat statue back again.
1260
Anachronisms: During the last game Vince Papale is tackled over the sidelines. When he is getting back on his feet you can see that he is wearing a modern Riddell power shoulder pad not in production at the time.
tp
Anachronisms : During the last game Vince Papale is tackled over the sidelines. When he is getting back on his feet you can see that he is wearing a modern Riddell power shoulder pad not in production at the time.
1261
Errors made by characters (possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers): Ali constantly refers to her Mustang as a "5.0" which is completely impossible for two reasons. One has been pointed out the 5.0 wasn't available in the 99 to 04 Mustangs the last time a 5.0 was available in a Mustang was 94-95. To further this mistake Ali's Mustang isn't even represented by the V8 of that generation but rather the v6 option.
tp
Errors made by characters ( possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers ): Ali constantly refers to her Mustang as a "5.0" which is completely impossible for two reasons. One has been pointed out , the 5.0 wasn't available in the 99 to 04 Mustangs , the last time a 5.0 was available in a Mustang was 94 - 95. To further this mistake Ali's Mustang isn't even represented by the V8 of that generation , but rather the v6 option.
1262
Errors in geography: The large map behind SI Childs in his office when he's talking to DI Frampton is of Cheltenham Gloucestershire. This is an odd priority for a senior police officer in London.
tp
Errors in geography : The large map behind SI Childs in his office when he's talking to DI Frampton is of Cheltenham , Gloucestershire. This is an odd priority for a senior police officer in London.
1263
Continuity: When Laurie receives Jo's letter in London telling him of Beth's death her voice-over says "Please Teddy come back to us". But when we see the letter a moment later it actually says "come back to me".
tp
Continuity : When Laurie receives Jo's letter in London , telling him of Beth's death , her voice - over says , "Please , Teddy , come back to us". But when we see the letter a moment later , it actually says "come back to me".
1264
Continuity: When Romy and Michele are leaving for the reunion in the Jaguar there is a television box in the back seat behind Romy. When they drive off the box disappears.
tp
Continuity : When Romy and Michele are leaving for the reunion in the Jaguar , there is a television box in the back seat behind Romy. When they drive off the box disappears.
1265
Continuity: When Bobby runs to Carol's aid after she's been beaten you can see the microphone wire hanging out of his shirt.
tp
Continuity : When Bobby runs to Carol's aid after she's been beaten , you can see the microphone wire hanging out of his shirt.
1266
Incorrectly regarded as goofs: Winston uses IP addresses in the private Class A net 10. This can be accepted as the Internet equivalent of a "555" telephone number. Because of schedule pressure and other plot points they are indeed likely to be using a largely standard protocol and not a purely proprietary one.
tp
Incorrectly regarded as goofs : Winston uses IP addresses in the private Class A net 10. This can be accepted as the Internet equivalent of a "555" telephone number. Because of schedule pressure and other plot points , they are indeed likely to be using a largely standard protocol , and not a purely proprietary one.
1267
Revealing mistakes: In the beginning of the movie when Peter gets the instant message at work and Howie goes to look at the laptop the Apple logo is not lit up as it would be when the laptop's power is on.
tp
Revealing mistakes : In the beginning of the movie , when Peter gets the instant message at work and Howie goes to look at the laptop , the Apple logo is not lit up as it would be when the laptop's power is on.
1268
Quotes H: Youssef! Do you believe I can do this? Agent Helen Brody: H. he believes it he believes it! H: Faith is not enough he has to know it! Agent Helen Brody: He knows it! H: Knowing is not enough! He has to see it.
fp
Continuity : After the present has been established as Wednesday , the FBI agents see the tape in which it is stated that three bombs will go off on Friday. Agent Vincent then says "But that's 4 days from now".
1269
Plot holes: The girls don't hold off on booking their trip to Abu Dhabi because they said if they waited a month they'd "burn up." But the clock by Carrie's bedside in the hotel says "Aug 26" which would be right in the middle (or rather toward the end of) the hottest time of the year. Additionally Miranda had just quit her job so she could go to Brady's science fair presentation at school. Even if it were a few weeks before Brady wouldn't be in school in the summer. When the girls returned from Abu Dhabi Samantha and Rikard celebrate the Fourth of July together.
tp
Plot holes : The girls don't hold off on booking their trip to Abu Dhabi because they said if they waited a month , they'd "burn up." But the clock by Carrie's bedside in the hotel says "Aug 26 , " which would be right in the middle ( or rather toward the end of ) the hottest time of the year. Additionally , Miranda had just quit her job so she could go to Brady's science fair presentation at school. Even if it were a few weeks before , Brady wouldn't be in school in the summer. When the girls returned from Abu Dhabi , Samantha and Rikard celebrate the Fourth of July together.
1270
Revealing mistakes: At the end of the film when Tristen is hiding the tapes she is being filmed. However the camera moves as if someone is holding it. How can anyone hold it if she sent the rest of the group into the forest to kill the tourist team?
tp
Revealing mistakes : At the end of the film , when Tristen is hiding the tapes , she is being filmed. However , the camera moves as if someone is holding it. How can anyone hold it if she sent the rest of the group into the forest to kill the tourist team?
1271

fn

1272
Continuity: When everyone gets off the coach after it stops at the fallen tree dark vehicle tracks have appeared in front of the coach which weren't there in previous shots.
tp
Continuity : When everyone gets off the coach after it stops at the fallen tree , dark vehicle tracks have appeared in front of the coach which weren't there in previous shots.
1273
Factual errors: In the scene where Russell works for the first time he gives some headings which are totally incorrect compared to the radar picture. He sends Continental on heading 060 which seconds later you see he is not flying. He also gives Delta "A steep left turn heading 090" when in fact Delta is already flying on heading 090 or maybe on heading 100 but still wouldn't be a steep turn at all.
tp
Factual errors : In the scene where Russell works for the first time he gives some headings which are totally incorrect compared to the radar picture. He sends Continental on heading 060 which seconds later you see he is not flying. He also gives Delta "A steep left turn heading 090" when in fact Delta is already flying on heading 090 or maybe on heading 100 but still wouldn't be a steep turn at all.
1274
Continuity: Sergeant Oakes (as listed in the end credits) wears a Name Tag on his Uniform as STOKES clearly visible when he picks up Bozz from the Stockade.
tp
Continuity : Sergeant Oakes ( as listed in the end credits ) wears a Name Tag on his Uniform as STOKES , clearly visible when he picks up Bozz from the Stockade.
1275
Errors made by characters (possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers): The film is set in Missouri yet the SUV in the last scenes has three surfboards attached to the rack on top of the vehicle. At best the closest place to surf is 300 miles away on Lake Michigan - unlikely or slightly more likely 650 miles away on the Gulf of Mexico or most likely more than 900 miles away at Virginia Beach Va.
tp
Errors made by characters ( possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers ): The film is set in Missouri , yet the SUV in the last scenes has three surfboards attached to the rack on top of the vehicle. At best , the closest place to surf is 300 miles away on Lake Michigan - unlikely , or slightly more likely 650 miles away on the Gulf of Mexico , or most likely more than 900 miles away at Virginia Beach , Va.
1276
Anachronisms: In 1949 Kenya would have been pronounced "Keen-ya" instead of "Kehn-ya" as it is today. The pronunciation change came about in 1963 when Kenya became independent from British rule. Characters in the movie use the modern pronunciation instead of the old.
tp
Anachronisms : In 1949 , Kenya would have been pronounced "Keen - ya" instead of "Kehn - ya , " as it is today. The pronunciation change came about in 1963 when Kenya became independent from British rule. Characters in the movie use the modern pronunciation instead of the old.
1277
Continuity: The stain on Tom Sanders' tie changes position.
tp
Continuity : The stain on Tom Sanders' tie changes position.
1278
Factual errors: After Bernadette is killed and Helen is in the hospital seeing Candyman the nurse says "Get me 1000 mls". 1000 mls is a liter - that volume is way to large for an IV injection on a human for any sedation drug.
tp
Factual errors : After Bernadette is killed and Helen is in the hospital seeing Candyman the nurse says "Get me 1000 mls". 1000 mls is a liter - that volume is way to large for an IV injection on a human for any sedation drug.
1279
Continuity: At the site of the safe robbery when The Young Man drops his pants to tape the money to his legs he's wearing striped underwear (which are also seen hanging on a clothesline during the confrontation between The Young Man and Cobb later in the film) but when he returns to his apartment and removes the money he's wearing underwear with polka dots.
tp
Continuity : At the site of the safe robbery , when The Young Man drops his pants to tape the money to his legs , he's wearing striped underwear ( which are also seen hanging on a clothesline during the confrontation between The Young Man and Cobb later in the film ), but when he returns to his apartment and removes the money , he's wearing underwear with polka dots.
1280
Revealing mistakes: When Rebecca is riding in a cab you can see a close-up of the window. Two billboards are reflected in the window but the images are not reversed.
tp
Revealing mistakes : When Rebecca is riding in a cab , you can see a close - up of the window. Two billboards are reflected in the window , but the images are not reversed.
1281
Audio/visual unsynchronized: When Tim is playing Mario Kart: Super Circuit we hear sound effects that are not from the game.
tp
Audio / visual unsynchronized : When Tim is playing Mario Kart : Super Circuit we hear sound effects that are not from the game.
1282
Errors made by characters (possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers): When the inmates are having their daydream envisioning the "Boom Boom Room" Ray tells Claude (the bus boy) to go get him some Worcestershire sauce. He pronounces it (Wor-chest-er-shire) instead of the correct way (Woost-er-shire).
tp
Errors made by characters ( possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers ): When the inmates are having their daydream , envisioning the "Boom Boom Room" , Ray tells Claude ( the bus boy ) to go get him some Worcestershire sauce. He pronounces it ( Wor - chest - er - shire ) instead of the correct way ( Woost - er - shire ) .
1283
Continuity: Briefly we see the legs of Pilgrim sliding down the bank ahead of the other horse but it is the other horse who reaches the road first. Also Pilgrim alternates between standing and lying as he slides down the bank.
tp
Continuity : Briefly , we see the legs of Pilgrim sliding down the bank ahead of the other horse but it is the other horse who reaches the road first. Also Pilgrim alternates between standing and lying as he slides down the bank.
1284
Continuity: When Harvard Hottie is reading the letter from Mrs. X at the end of the movie the words he says do not match the words on the letter.
tp
Continuity : When Harvard Hottie is reading the letter from Mrs. X at the end of the movie , the words he says do not match the words on the letter.
1285
Continuity: When Linda Stiles is introduced for the first time and is speaking about Sutter Cain's book she takes her glasses off and folds them twice.
tp
Continuity : When Linda Stiles is introduced for the first time and is speaking about Sutter Cain's book , she takes her glasses off and folds them twice.
1286
Continuity: When Xavier is at the airport getting ready to leave for Barcelona he goes to talk to Martine and then returns to his mother and picks up his small backpack. He then goes back to Martine without his backpack returns to his mother and picks up his backpack again.
tp
Continuity : When Xavier is at the airport getting ready to leave for Barcelona , he goes to talk to Martine and then returns to his mother and picks up his small backpack. He then goes back to Martine , without his backpack , returns to his mother and picks up his backpack again.
1287
Factual errors: Senator Morton receives a color fax on a machine far too simple a model to accept one.
tp
Factual errors : Senator Morton receives a color fax on a machine far too simple a model to accept one.
1288
Errors in geography: Linus is shown looking at a fishing village (Menemsha) on Martha's Vineyard through a camera lens. He pans across until he comes to a lighthouse. There is no lighthouse in Menemsha. The lighthouse shown is in Edgartown clear on the other side of the island (20 miles away).
tp
Errors in geography : Linus is shown looking at a fishing village ( Menemsha ) on Martha's Vineyard through a camera lens. He pans across until he comes to a lighthouse. There is no lighthouse in Menemsha. The lighthouse shown is in Edgartown , clear on the other side of the island ( 20 miles away ) .
1289
Anachronisms: The bagpipes being played at the dance scene are too small to be highland pipes. They look more like Irish pipes which are totally wrong for the period and the region depicted in the film.
tp
Anachronisms : The bagpipes being played at the dance scene are too small to be highland pipes. They look more like Irish pipes , which are totally wrong for the period and the region depicted in the film.
1290
Errors made by characters (possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers): During rehearsal when the bride and groom are facing each other they're told by Sergeant Volkom to turn 180 degrees. They do however turn 90 degrees facing the room (as they should). Had they in fact turned 180 degrees they would of course be standing back to back instead.
tp
Errors made by characters ( possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers ): During rehearsal , when the bride and groom are facing each other , they're told by Sergeant Volkom to turn 180 degrees. They do however turn 90 degrees , facing the room ( as they should ) . Had they in fact turned 180 degrees they would of course be standing back to back instead.

tp
Continuity : The mole on the mother's forehead disappears in some shots. This is most noticeable when she is speaking with Connie in her room.

tp

tp

1297
Crew or equipment visible: When the kids and Cat slide down the pole into the club it is clearly noticeable that they used stunt-men sliding down and not the kids and Cat - different clothes & hair.
fp
Crew or equipment visible : When the kids and Cat slide down the pole into the club , it is clearly noticeable that they used stunt - men sliding down and not the kids and Cat - different clothes & hair.
1298
Revealing mistakes: This film takes place sometime during the winter and the opening story takes place in Los Angeles starting at 7:07 PM. At no time during the winter would Los Angeles be this sunny at 7:07 PM. In fact only on March 20 (the last day of winter) would the sun set as late as 7:07 PM and even in that case there wouldn't be very much sunlight.
tp
Revealing mistakes : This film takes place sometime during the winter , and the opening story takes place in Los Angeles starting at 7 : 07 PM. At no time during the winter would Los Angeles be this sunny at 7 : 07 PM. In fact , only on March 20 ( the last day of winter ) would the sun set as late as 7 : 07 PM and , even in that case , there wouldn't be very much sunlight.
1299
Continuity: When John Warren is bowled whilst playing cricket the stumps are at a different angle from one shot to the next.
tp
Continuity : When John Warren is bowled whilst playing cricket , the stumps are at a different angle from one shot to the next.

1302

1303

tp
Errors made by characters ( possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers ): Helen gives David a gift on his birthday , and calls him a Scorpio. Two scenes later , it is September 24th. The sun enters the sign of Scorpio at the end of October. David is a Virgo or a Libra.

1309
Quotes Brett: Follow the blood!
fp
Continuity : Although the entire movie is set and was filmed during summertime with leafy trees and lush undergrowth , the additional aerial filming was obviously carried out in fall and repeatedly shows sequences with leafless vegetation and all the foliage lying on the ground.
1310
Errors made by characters (possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers): Spongebob points out that he has been awarded Employee of the Month award 374 times in a row. That would mean that he would have worked at the Krusty Krab for 31 years. This could not happen - according to Stephen Hillenburg Spongebob was born in 1984 which would mean that as of 2004 he would only be 20.
tp
Errors made by characters ( possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers ): Spongebob points out that he has been awarded Employee of the Month award 374 times in a row. That would mean that he would have worked at the Krusty Krab for 31 years. This could not happen - according to Stephen Hillenburg , Spongebob was born in 1984 , which would mean that , as of 2004 , he would only be 20.
1311
Revealing mistakes: At several times during in the film notably during the slushy scene outside the big A you can see Lloyd's tooth through the blackout makeup.
tp

tp

1313
Anachronisms: Daisy Bell ("A Bicycle Built for Two") was published by Harry Dacre in 1892. This movie is set in the 1860s.
tp
Anachronisms : Daisy Bell ( "A Bicycle Built for Two" ) was published by Harry Dacre in 1892. This movie is set in the 1860s.
1314
Errors made by characters (possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers): When Susan goes into the abandoned subway office looking for Manny she calls out "Chuy?" and not "Manny?" Chuy is hiding in the office but at that point in the film she doesn't know it yet; she has no reason to expect to encounter Chuy and no reason to call his name. In fact as far as we know she shouldn't even know his name.
tp
Errors made by characters ( possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers ): When Susan goes into the abandoned subway office looking for Manny , she calls out "Chuy?" and not "Manny?" Chuy is hiding in the office , but at that point in the film she doesn't know it yet ; she has no reason to expect to encounter Chuy and no reason to call his name. In fact , as far as we know , she shouldn't even know his name.
1315

tp
Errors made by characters ( possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers ): At one point in the movie , instead of being called by the fictional name Kate , Kate is called by her actual real name , Sophia.

fp
Factual errors : Upon entrance to Damon Richards' hospital room the cardiac monitor reads 76 , yet the audible beeping is closer to rate of 66.
1317
Anachronisms: In the final debate against Harvard James Farmer Jr. goes to the hot seat and clicks a ballpoint pen closed. The movie is set in 1935; the ballpoint pen was patented in 1938.
tp
Anachronisms : In the final debate against Harvard , James Farmer Jr. goes to the hot seat and clicks a ballpoint pen closed. The movie is set in 1935 ; the ballpoint pen was patented in 1938.
1318
Anachronisms: In the saloon scene where Wild Bill Hickok is killed (1876) there is a Miller beer "Girl on the Moon" picture on the wall. Although Miller beer started operations in 1855 the "Girl on the Moon" advertising was first used in 1907 and it wasn't the same picture as the one in the movie.
tp
Anachronisms : In the saloon scene where Wild Bill Hickok is killed ( 1876 ), there is a Miller beer "Girl on the Moon" picture on the wall. Although Miller beer started operations in 1855 , the "Girl on the Moon" advertising was first used in 1907 and it wasn't the same picture as the one in the movie.
1319
Continuity: Walking out of the Police Dept. when Joey's mom opens the car door the window is up after she gets into the car its down even though the car is not running.
tp
Continuity : Walking out of the Police Dept. when Joey's mom opens the car door the window is up , after she gets into the car its down even though the car is not running.

tp

A few shots later he stands facing the others and is seemingly dry ( at 53 : 04 to 53 : 07 and 53 : 23 to 53 : 27 ), definitely too dry to have just been immersed in water.
1327

tp
Continuity : At one scene the old man gets glass splinter in his hands , and are unable to hold the shotgun or close the door , but then as soon as the first attack is over the cuts on his hands suddenly disappear ; he is now able to slam the window for help , grab the shotgun and perform shooting etcetera without any harm.
1328
Errors in geography: When Agent Janet McKaren contacts Agent Foreman at the Diva show via his cell phone in order to trace his location the map show them at the corner of Koval St and Harmon St. When Hart and Fuller leave the Diva show they exit out of the entrance of the 4 Queens Casino which is located in Downtown Las Vegas which is 4.5 miles away on the other side of Las Vegas no where near Koval and Harmon.
tp
Errors in geography : When Agent Janet McKaren contacts Agent Foreman at the Diva show via his cell phone in order to trace his location , the map show them at the corner of Koval St and Harmon St. When Hart and Fuller leave the Diva show they exit out of the entrance of the 4 Queens Casino which is located in Downtown Las Vegas which is 4.5 miles away on the other side of Las Vegas no where near Koval and Harmon.
1329

tp
Continuity : When Claire is out jogging and is being followed by the pick - up truck - the store she goes to has a prominent "ADT Security" sticker on the door from the exterior shot ( looking into the store ), but from the shot looking out toward her there is no sign.
1330
Continuity: In the pizza restaurant in one scene John hits the bowl of food and it's all over the counter in the next scene all the food has been cleaned up and is neatly back in the bowl. Not enough time had elapsed for the contents to have been cleaned then placed back into the bowl.
tp
Continuity : In the pizza restaurant , in one scene John hits the bowl of food and it's all over the counter , in the next scene , all the food has been cleaned up and is neatly back in the bowl. Not enough time had elapsed for the contents to have been cleaned then placed back into the bowl.

Continuity : When Frances is calling Patti from the phone booth right before it rains , her hair changes from behind her ear / pulled back neatly to in front of her ear / slightly messy
1332
Factual errors: When Sébastien and Gaëlle are on the plane about to fly back to London the pilot announces that they will land at Heathrow at 7.45 in the morning. The shot of the plane taking off is a Swiss airline plane. Swiss does not fly from Montréal to London direct.
tp
Factual errors : When Sébastien and Gaëlle are on the plane about to fly back to London , the pilot announces that they will land at Heathrow at 7.45 in the morning. The shot of the plane taking off is a Swiss airline plane. Swiss does not fly from Montréal to London direct.
1333
Revealing mistakes: When the army crosses the river rain is clearly falling into the water in the foreground but not in the background which is glassy smooth.
tp
Revealing mistakes : When the army crosses the river , rain is clearly falling into the water in the foreground but not in the background , which is glassy smooth.
1334
Errors made by characters (possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers): When Chuck Max and John are talking about Ariel at the bait shop John says that Ariel came to see him last night at 2:00am. Ariel came to see him two nights ago not last night.
tp
Errors made by characters ( possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers ): When Chuck , Max , and John are talking about Ariel at the bait shop , John says that Ariel came to see him last night at 2 : 00am. Ariel came to see him two nights ago , not last night.
1335
Continuity: When Mirabelle turns and walks towards Jeremy after her final meeting with Ray an aerial shot shows Jeremy to be raising his arms to embrace her. In the next shot his arms are at his sides.
tp
Continuity : When Mirabelle turns and walks towards Jeremy after her final meeting with Ray , an aerial shot shows Jeremy to be raising his arms to embrace her. In the next shot , his arms are at his sides.
1336
Errors made by characters (possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers): Alden shows Phuong a picture of Fanueuil Hall in Boston and says "This is Fanway Hall". Sounds like Fenway Hall. Bostonians say 'Fanyel" hall or less often 'Fan-you-well' hall. Fenway Park is where the Red Sox play so named because is is near the Fens a marshy area off the Charles river. Fenway has nothing to do with Faneuil.
tp
Errors made by characters ( possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers ): Alden shows Phuong a picture of Fanueuil Hall in Boston and says , "This is Fanway Hall". Sounds like Fenway Hall. Bostonians say 'Fanyel" hall , or less often , 'Fan - you - well' hall. Fenway Park is where the Red Sox play , so named because is is near the Fens , a marshy area off the Charles river. Fenway has nothing to do with Faneuil.
1337
Revealing mistakes: When McQuarry answers the phone in the elevator after he realizes he has Bose's cell phone he looks at it and it is actually still ringing as an incoming call.
tp
Revealing mistakes : When McQuarry answers the phone in the elevator after he realizes he has Bose's cell phone he looks at it and it is actually still ringing as an incoming call.
1338
Incorrectly regarded as goofs: While Chaplin is incorrectly depicted playing the violin right-handed (he was a left-handed musician) Chaplin wrote with his right hand.
tp
Incorrectly regarded as goofs : While Chaplin is incorrectly depicted playing the violin right - handed ( he was a left - handed musician ), Chaplin wrote with his right hand.
1339
Continuity: A chase scene begins during a heavy downpour. In the next shot it stops raining and the car is completely dry.
tp
Continuity : A chase scene begins during a heavy downpour. In the next shot it stops raining and the car is completely dry.
1340
Continuity: When Jess is attacked in the basement she's wearing work boots and when she runs out on the porch and goes back inside and slides down to the floor she's wearing sneakers.
tp
Continuity : When Jess is attacked in the basement , she's wearing work boots and when she runs out on the porch and goes back inside and slides down to the floor she's wearing sneakers.
1341
Anachronisms: Blanche and Bill drive past a modern Yield sign.
tp
Anachronisms : Blanche and Bill drive past a modern Yield sign.
1342
Factual errors: The main characters are iguanodons. Iguanodons actually had hard beaks for mouths except when the film makers decided to have the dinos speak the beaks just didn't work well with speech movements. So fleshy lips were modeled over the beaks for speech and the beaks underneath act like pseudo-teeth in the final film.
tp
Factual errors : The main characters are iguanodons. Iguanodons actually had hard beaks for mouths , except when the film makers decided to have the dinos speak , the beaks just didn't work well with speech movements. So fleshy lips were modeled over the beaks for speech , and the beaks underneath act like pseudo - teeth in the final film.
1343
Revealing mistakes: The license plates PA8 - 357 and AD7 - 926 appear on two different vehicles each.
tp
Revealing mistakes : The license plates PA8 - 357 and AD7 - 926 appear on two different vehicles each.
1344
Anachronisms: There is a travel prayer note hanging on the rear-view mirror of the taxi in which Danny goes to the Village Restaurant in January 2002. The note has a branding of "GMSA Glue" which was not launched until mid of 2004.
tp
Anachronisms : There is a travel prayer note hanging on the rear - view mirror of the taxi in which Danny goes to the Village Restaurant in January 2002. The note has a branding of "GMSA Glue" , which was not launched until mid of 2004.
1345
Revealing mistakes: During the warehouse fight when Jaa fights a bunch of Johnny's goons he does the back-flip into a handstand to avoid the dirt bike. You can clearly see the supposed brick wall move behind him when Jaa bounces off it.
tp
Revealing mistakes : During the warehouse fight , when Jaa fights a bunch of Johnny's goons he does the back - flip into a handstand , to avoid the dirt bike. You can clearly see the supposed brick wall move behind him , when Jaa bounces off it.
1346
Errors in geography: In the opening sequence with the bicycle palm trees are visible. The movie is set in New York City.
tp
Errors in geography : In the opening sequence with the bicycle , palm trees are visible. The movie is set in New York City.
1347
Continuity: In the scene when Steve is trying to fire Stavi in one of the first shots of Stavi cleaning the toilet the seat is down. Then it shows Steve talking. When it goes back to Stavi cleaning the seat is up.
tp
Continuity : In the scene when Steve is trying to fire Stavi , in one of the first shots of Stavi cleaning the toilet , the seat is down. Then it shows Steve talking. When it goes back to Stavi cleaning , the seat is up.

tp

1350
Continuity: When Jonathan boards the team plane his jacket jumps from being carried over his shoulder to being worn between shots.
tp
Continuity : When Jonathan boards the team plane his jacket jumps from being carried over his shoulder to being worn between shots.
1351
Continuity: When Douglas is first walking through the creature settlement his shirt sleeves are rolled up. In the next shot from the same scene his sleeves have gone down
tp
Continuity : When Douglas is first walking through the creature settlement , his shirt sleeves are rolled up. In the next shot from the same scene , his sleeves have gone down
1352
Continuity: When Nat goes to file a missing person report at the police station Officer Mitchell has a pastry with a candle that she puts in the drawer of her desk. As it goes in it looks to be a brand new candle and when she takes it out there is none left. It would be impossible for the candle to burn completely in the period of time.
tp
Continuity : When Nat goes to file a missing person report at the police station , Officer Mitchell has a pastry with a candle that she puts in the drawer of her desk. As it goes in it looks to be a brand new candle and when she takes it out there is none left. It would be impossible for the candle to burn completely in the period of time.
1353
Continuity: When you see the flashback with DJ and his brother walking along the railroad there are two different angles shown. In one of them the sun has almost set in the other one the sun is still clearly over the horizon.
tp
Continuity : When you see the flashback with DJ and his brother walking along the railroad there are two different angles shown. In one of them the sun has almost set , in the other one the sun is still clearly over the horizon.
1354

I remember being 13 years old sitting in my room all night listening to the same song over and over. I thought that if I could write something beautiful...

tp

1361
Factual errors: At the cinema Carter films First Blood with a camcorder but the aspect ratio it is being show in is 1:85:1. "First Blood" was a CinemaScope film so this aspect ratio is incorrect.
tp
Factual errors : At the cinema Carter films First Blood with a camcorder , but the aspect ratio it is being show in is 1 : 85 : 1. "First Blood" was a CinemaScope film so this aspect ratio is incorrect.
1362
Continuity: When Ashley is talking to Antonio in her apartment and hes on the other sidehis position changes between shots. In one shot he moves away from the door and when Ashley calls out to him again in the next shot hes near the door and in the next shot hes again in his previous position.
tp
Continuity : When Ashley is talking to Antonio in her apartment and hes on the other side , his position changes between shots. In one shot he moves away from the door and when Ashley calls out to him again in the next shot hes near the door and in the next shot hes again in his previous position.
1363
Anachronisms: As Squires laments on the new New York he quotes Starbucks as an example of the city's Disneyfication. But 1994 was Starbucks' New York debut and they were not yet synonymous with unchecked corporate growth.
tp
Anachronisms : As Squires laments on the new New York he quotes Starbucks as an example of the city's Disneyfication. But 1994 was Starbucks' New York debut and they were not yet synonymous with unchecked corporate growth.
1364
Continuity: When Mattie enters her apartment at the beginning of the movie she is wearing blue jeans. Then while reading in bed she is wearing light brown slacks. During her walk from her bed to Izzie's room she is wearing the light brown slacks and suddenly has blue jeans on again.
tp
Continuity : When Mattie enters her apartment at the beginning of the movie , she is wearing blue jeans. Then , while reading in bed , she is wearing light brown slacks. During her walk from her bed to Izzie's room , she is wearing the light brown slacks and suddenly has blue jeans on again.
1365
Revealing mistakes: After the accident with the fat guy it starts to rain but neither Gus or the fat guy has rain on their clothing or hair.
tp

1366

tp

1367
Continuity: When Davenport has a session with Antwone at his home virtually all the props behind Davenport have minds of their own including: the small dark table the fruit sits on the lamp a long table which first is off to Davenport's rear-left with the lamp and some folders on it then directly behind Davenport. Later the folders move to Davenport's rear-right. Also when Antwone first sits down he's holding his glass of cider but it suddenly appears on the desk in the very next shot. We would have seen him set it there because the scene has no breaks in it. The level of liquid seems to vary incorrectly in some shots.
tp
Continuity : When Davenport has a session with Antwone at his home , virtually all the props behind Davenport have minds of their own , including : the small dark table the fruit sits on , the lamp , a long table , which first is off to Davenport's rear - left with the lamp and some folders on it , then directly behind Davenport. Later , the folders move to Davenport's rear - right. Also , when Antwone first sits down he's holding his glass of cider but it suddenly appears on the desk in the very next shot. We would have seen him set it there because the scene has no breaks in it. The level of liquid seems to vary incorrectly in some shots.
1368

tp
Crew or equipment visible : A member of the crews' reflection appears briefly in the mirror when Novalee is shaving her legs in the bathroom at Walmart. It clearly was not Novalee's reflection ; as it was the wrong angle.
1369
Continuity: When Jake saw the tube empty he swam to it. Shortly when he was back on the boat he is completely dry including his shorts.
tp

1370

1371
Continuity: During the opening scenes of the movie the lizard that they have been hunting is killed and when they are carrying it back to their home the lizard is first carried one way then switches with the change in camera angle and then changes back.
tp
Continuity : During the opening scenes of the movie the lizard that they have been hunting is killed and when they are carrying it back to their home the lizard is first carried one way then switches with the change in camera angle and then changes back.
1372
Incorrectly regarded as goofs: Most police agencies including the South Carolina police do not use wheel guns. All revolvers have been replaced by semi-auto pistol usually in a 9mm size. However many agencies do permit individual officers to use weapons of their own choice so it is possible although not likely for a revolver to be used by a law officer.
tp
Incorrectly regarded as goofs : Most police agencies including the South Carolina police do not use wheel guns. All revolvers have been replaced by semi - auto pistol usually in a 9mm size. However , many agencies do permit individual officers to use weapons of their own choice , so it is possible , although not likely , for a revolver to be used by a law officer.
1373
Continuity: At the block party a party-goer fires a corked rifle but a dart is seen popping the balloon target.
tp
Continuity : At the block party , a party - goer fires a corked rifle , but a dart is seen popping the balloon target.

tp
Continuity : During her welcome speech at the Benefit dance , Honey's gold necklace constantly changes from over her blouse to under to back on top of it again.

tp

1382
Factual errors: California does not use a machine to administer the drugs used to conduct lethal injections. Rather it is done manually.

1383

tp

1384

tp

tp

1386
Errors made by characters (possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers): Consuming death caps may result in death after days but certainly not minutes as claimed by the cook Tarak.
tp
Errors made by characters ( possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers ): Consuming death caps may result in death after days , but certainly not minutes as claimed by the cook , Tarak.

1388

tp

1389
Continuity: On the first night at the cabin Peter puts a dark green blanket over Hardenberg. In the morning when they all wake Hardenberg is covered with a completely different blanket.
tp

1390
Errors made by characters (possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers): When Dave's mom asks Link if his necklace is old Link nods in the affirmative. If Link was a caveman and still had very limited speaking skills he wouldn't be able to comprehend the question.
tp
Errors made by characters ( possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers ): When Dave's mom asks Link if his necklace is old , Link nods in the affirmative. If Link was a caveman and still had very limited speaking skills , he wouldn't be able to comprehend the question.
1391
Continuity: When Juan takes his first swing with the axe to break the hot tub the blade is towards the glass in one shot and in the next shot the axe is reversed.
tp
Continuity : When Juan takes his first swing with the axe to break the hot tub , the blade is towards the glass in one shot and in the next shot , the axe is reversed.
1392
Continuity: McClane says that the Yankees tickets were behind the home team dugout at Yankee Stadium but when Zeus arrives at the stadium the seats he goes to are behind the visitors' dugout. The Yankees' dugout says "New York Yankees" on top rather than "Welcome to Yankee Stadium" which is seen in the film. Also the right field foul pole down the first base line can clearly be seen behind Zeus.
tp
Continuity : McClane says that the Yankees tickets were behind the home team dugout at Yankee Stadium , but when Zeus arrives at the stadium , the seats he goes to are behind the visitors' dugout. The Yankees' dugout says "New York Yankees" on top rather than "Welcome to Yankee Stadium" , which is seen in the film. Also , the right field foul pole , down the first base line , can clearly be seen behind Zeus.
1393
Factual errors: In some cold scenes in the LEM breath is visible. The warm breath rises which wouldn't happen in a weightless environment.
tp
Factual errors : In some cold scenes in the LEM , breath is visible. The warm breath rises , which wouldn't happen in a weightless environment.

tp

1407

tp

1409
Errors made by characters (possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers): In front of the portrait of his ancestor Henry tells Daphne that Field Marshal Bingley Dashwood lost an arm at the Battle of the Nile. Field Marshal is the highest rank in the British army but the Battle of the Nile was a naval engagement.
tp
Errors made by characters ( possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers ): In front of the portrait of his ancestor , Henry tells Daphne that Field Marshal Bingley Dashwood lost an arm at the Battle of the Nile. Field Marshal is the highest rank in the British army , but the Battle of the Nile was a naval engagement.
1410

fp

His mouth is still moving for that split second after he finishes the line , but before they show Max's Face.
1411

tp

1412
Continuity: During the scene where Alex pushes the guard who gets slashed by the trains' wheels the guard falls backwards so he's suppose to be lying on his back but on the shot where Alex is standing next to him the guard seems to be as he fell forward and lies on his stomach.
tp
Continuity : During the scene where Alex pushes the guard who gets slashed by the trains' wheels , the guard falls backwards , so he's suppose to be lying on his back , but on the shot where Alex is standing next to him , the guard seems to be as he fell forward , and lies on his stomach.
1413
Miscellaneous: When Bannister takes his daughter into his study he closes the door. The visual record is shot along the length of his arm so either his eyes are in the middle of his chest of the camera was shooting from too low.
tp
Miscellaneous : When Bannister takes his daughter into his study , he closes the door. The visual record is shot along the length of his arm , so either his eyes are in the middle of his chest , of the camera was shooting from too low.
1414
Anachronisms: At Lamarque's funeral the band plays "Grande symphonie funèbre et triomphale" which Hector Berlioz composed in 1840 eight years after these events.
tp
Anachronisms : At Lamarque's funeral the band plays "Grande symphonie funèbre et triomphale" which Hector Berlioz composed in 1840 , eight years after these events.
1415
Continuity: Although several brands of mobile phones are used in the film every time a display is shown it is a NOKIA 5110.
tp
Continuity : Although several brands of mobile phones are used in the film , every time a display is shown it is a NOKIA 5110.
1416
Factual errors: When Elwood meets Cab for the first time and tells him about Curtis Cab says that his mother lives in Phoenix Arizona and then calls her. He is in Chicago and only dials 7 numbers when he needed an area code.
tp
Factual errors : When Elwood meets Cab for the first time and tells him about Curtis , Cab says that his mother lives in Phoenix , Arizona and then calls her. He is in Chicago and only dials 7 numbers when he needed an area code.
1417
Continuity: Jim is first seen sitting on top of the inn while eavesdropping on Dr. Doppler and his mother when he slides off the roof to meet with the turtle like alien who crashed out on a ledge. When Jim is seen carrying the alien from its ship back to the inn they are no longer out on the ledge but on a dirt road much further away.
tp
Continuity : Jim is first seen sitting on top of the inn while eavesdropping on Dr. Doppler and his mother when he slides off the roof to meet with the turtle like alien who crashed out on a ledge. When Jim is seen carrying the alien from its ship back to the inn , they are no longer out on the ledge , but on a dirt road much further away.
1418
Continuity: The date is established as early March in New York City yet the trees are in full bloom.
tp
Continuity : The date is established as early March in New York City yet the trees are in full bloom.
1419

1420

fn

1421
Continuity: At the end of the film when the snapshots are shown of April and her mother hugging April is wearing a pink sweater. In the very next shot of Joy's face April is not wearing the sweater.
tp
Continuity : At the end of the film , when the snapshots are shown of April and her mother hugging , April is wearing a pink sweater. In the very next shot of Joy's face April is not wearing the sweater.
1422
Audio/visual unsynchronized: When Owen says "Be quiet I'm trying to work on this story. It's due tomorrow" you can hear him typing but there is nothing written on the screen.
tp
Audio / visual unsynchronized : When Owen says , "Be quiet , I'm trying to work on this story. It's due tomorrow , " you can hear him typing , but there is nothing written on the screen.
1423
Continuity: At the end Ed Harris is pointing his gun at Samuel Jackson with the trigger in the rearward position something that only happens when the double action/single action Beretta is cocked. The trigger should be at rest in the forward position. When agitated Ed cocks the hammer and we see that the trigger is still in the rearward position. Only at cocking should the trigger have gone from forward position to rear position.
tp
Continuity : At the end , Ed Harris is pointing his gun at Samuel Jackson with the trigger in the rearward position , something that only happens when the double action / single action Beretta is cocked. The trigger should be at rest , in the forward position. When agitated , Ed cocks the hammer and we see that the trigger is still in the rearward position. Only at cocking should the trigger have gone from forward position to rear position.
1424
Continuity: When Slannen the elf frees Ella from prison Ella opens Benny to find out where Edgar is. When she opens the book she opens to the first page. In the next shot the book's pages have been opened to the middle.
tp
Continuity : When Slannen the elf frees Ella from prison , Ella opens Benny to find out where Edgar is. When she opens the book she opens to the first page. In the next shot the book's pages have been opened to the middle.
1425
Continuity: The amount of water in the glass when Isabel tells Alex that she is pregnant.
tp
Continuity : The amount of water in the glass when Isabel tells Alex that she is pregnant.
1426
Continuity: During the first dinner scene Fish says the last time he saw Matt that he was building a robot. Matt responds that it was when he was 10. Later when Matt is asking fish to drum for them he says that Fish called him Max until he was 11.
tp
Continuity : During the first dinner scene , Fish says the last time he saw Matt that he was building a robot. Matt responds that it was when he was 10. Later when Matt is asking fish to drum for them he says that Fish called him Max until he was 11.

tp
Crew or equipment visible : A microphone can be seen when Justin is bringing his prize back home.
1428
Anachronisms: Within the first few minutes of the film a second generation Honda Prelude is seen passing in the street. In 1981 when the film takes place the Prelude was still in the first generation (1979 - 1982).
tp
Anachronisms : Within the first few minutes of the film , a second generation Honda Prelude is seen passing in the street. In 1981 when the film takes place , the Prelude was still in the first generation ( 1979 - 1982 ) .
1429
Quotes Archie Moses: Hey Man! What are you doing? You just wasted good weed!
fp

1430
Continuity: When Neil runs to the clock tower he's all sweaty - his shirt is all wet then in the elevator he's neat and clean then on the roof he's wet again.
tp

1431
Continuity: When Bev's dad is shining the flashlight into the backseat of the car from Faye's POV she is rolling over to her right. The POV from outside the car shows she is rolling over to her left.
tp
Continuity : When Bev's dad is shining the flashlight into the backseat of the car , from Faye's POV she is rolling over to her right. The POV from outside the car shows she is rolling over to her left.
1432
Continuity: When he is posing as a chef in the Japanese restaurant Haru throws the slab of meat onto the grill so that it lands on the opposite side. In the next shot the meat is in the center of the grill.
tp
Continuity : When he is posing as a chef in the Japanese restaurant , Haru throws the slab of meat onto the grill so that it lands on the opposite side. In the next shot , the meat is in the center of the grill.
1433
Crew or equipment visible: When everyone is taking the trunk upstairs the shadow of a boom mic is visible above Maggie Smith's head moving around.
tp
Crew or equipment visible : When everyone is taking the trunk upstairs , the shadow of a boom mic is visible above Maggie Smith's head moving around.
1434
Factual errors: Eamonn De Valera is shown surrendering with the General Post Office garrison after the Easter Rising. However he was actually Commandant of the garrison at Bolland's Mills which surrendered after the GPO upon receiving orders to stand down. He was never at the GPO during the Rising.
tp
Factual errors : Eamonn De Valera is shown surrendering with the General Post Office garrison after the Easter Rising. However , he was actually Commandant of the garrison at Bolland's Mills , which surrendered after the GPO upon receiving orders to stand down. He was never at the GPO during the Rising.
1435
Errors in geography: After arriving in Tokyo Hubert asks Momo to drive him to Shinjuku district to meet the lawyer. However the following scene shows Hubert getting out of the car at Akihabara (the famous electronics shopping district) which is on the other side of Tokyo. This is evident by the iconic Akihabara pedestrian crossing under the green train bridge where he gets off. Later on Hubert again leaves "Shinjuku" from what is clearly Akihabara and its electronics shops in the background.
tp
Errors in geography : After arriving in Tokyo , Hubert asks Momo to drive him to Shinjuku district to meet the lawyer. However , the following scene shows Hubert getting out of the car at Akihabara ( the famous electronics shopping district ) which is on the other side of Tokyo. This is evident by the iconic Akihabara pedestrian crossing under the green train bridge where he gets off. Later on , Hubert again leaves "Shinjuku" from what is clearly Akihabara and its electronics shops in the background.
1436
Errors in geography: The camels in Gobi Desesrt are dromedary (one-humped) but They live in North Africa and West Asia and adjacent areas. Camels in Gobi are Bactrain which have two humps.
tp
Errors in geography : The camels in Gobi Desesrt are dromedary ( one - humped ), but They live in North Africa and West Asia and adjacent areas. Camels in Gobi are Bactrain , which have two humps.
1437
Miscellaneous: When crossing the street a cab stops honks and driver says "why are you walking here?" as a nod to "Midnight Cowboy."
tp
Miscellaneous : When crossing the street , a cab stops , honks , and driver says "why are you walking here?" as a nod to "Midnight Cowboy."
1438
Continuity: When Anne Marie goes to the hotel party in the black dress she arrives without a handbag. However when she goes to the washroom to check the wave reports on her phone she has a black handbag.
tp
Continuity : When Anne Marie goes to the hotel party in the black dress , she arrives without a handbag. However when she goes to the washroom to check the wave reports on her phone she has a black handbag.

tp

tp

1449
Incorrectly regarded as goofs: This is a film that adheres to the 'Dogme 95' manifesto so the usual goof rules do not necessarily apply. This includes shots of the crew microphones and other equipment as well as continuity errors.

1466
Errors made by characters (possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers): When Jo Lynn gives her history project presentation as Marilyn Monroe she says that she persuaded John F. Kennedy to sign the Nuclear Arms Treaty and advised him on the Cuban Missle Crisis; both events occurred after Monroe's death.
tp
Errors made by characters ( possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers ): When Jo Lynn gives her history project presentation as Marilyn Monroe , she says that she persuaded John F. Kennedy to sign the Nuclear Arms Treaty and advised him on the Cuban Missle Crisis ; both events occurred after Monroe's death.
1467

1470

tp

1471
Revealing mistakes: Throughout the entire movie whenever there is a scene (and there are many) involving martinis between shots the olives and level of vodka in the glass change. This happens many time when a character either eats an olive or is about to eat one it will re-appear in the glass seconds later. Also - many times where the character is starting to say something and the view is changed to be from their point of view and their lips are no longer moving.
tp
Revealing mistakes : Throughout the entire movie , whenever there is a scene ( and there are many ) involving martinis , between shots the olives and level of vodka in the glass change. This happens many time when a character either eats an olive or is about to eat one , it will re - appear in the glass seconds later. Also - many times where the character is starting to say something , and the view is changed to be from their point of view and their lips are no longer moving.
1472
Continuity: During the scene in which Ram goes to visit Ishaan's parents he is stopped at a bus station and sees a kid serving tea a man with a black shirt walks behind him. The shot cuts to Ram and then back to the kid serving tea doing something different but that same-black shirted man is walking behind him.
tp
Continuity : During the scene in which Ram goes to visit Ishaan's parents , he is stopped at a bus station and sees a kid serving tea , a man with a black shirt walks behind him. The shot cuts to Ram and then back to the kid serving tea doing something different , but that same - black shirted man is walking behind him.
1473
Continuity: In the scene when Mimi cuts her hair for the first time and bakes a Turkey for Oscar he is wearing the same turtle necked blue sweater that was ripped off with a razor blade during a previous sex game.
tp
Continuity : In the scene when Mimi cuts her hair for the first time and bakes a Turkey for Oscar , he is wearing the same turtle necked blue sweater that was ripped off with a razor blade during a previous sex game.
1474
Continuity: A sleeping baby is shown with blood spattered on his face in one shot and in the next shot his face is completely clean.
tp
Continuity : A sleeping baby is shown with blood spattered on his face in one shot , and in the next shot his face is completely clean.
1475

1476

tp

1477
Miscellaneous: In the scene where Alex Rover is trying to convince Alexandra Rover to go outside to the taxi they show the door is latched. In the next scene Alex Rover walk over to the door and the latch is undone.
tp

1478
Continuity: When Darren is about to drink Rebecca's blood she pulls her shirt down and there is a strap still left on her shoulder. When the shot switches to her back the strap is gone and upon snapping back to her front it is there again.
tp
Continuity : When Darren is about to drink Rebecca's blood , she pulls her shirt down and there is a strap still left on her shoulder. When the shot switches to her back , the strap is gone , and upon snapping back to her front , it is there again.
1479
Factual errors: Along with the warden's barracks exterior shots of the island also show the rubble on the south end of the island when the apartments where many of guards' families should be seen given the time period.
tp
Factual errors : Along with the warden's barracks , exterior shots of the island also show the rubble on the south end of the island when the apartments where many of guards' families should be seen , given the time period.
1480
Factual errors: The doctor examining Farmer's eye is looking through an otoscope - an instrument for examining the ear canal. He should be using an ophthalmoscope to look into the eyes.
tp
Factual errors : The doctor examining Farmer's eye is looking through an otoscope - an instrument for examining the ear canal. He should be using an ophthalmoscope to look into the eyes.
1481
Continuity: It is raining when Ben and Jane drive down the road. When they hit the ghost the scene fades to black. When the scene fades back in it's snowing heavily and a thick sheet of snow covers the ground. They start talking as they get out of the car and the snow stops.
tp
Continuity : It is raining when Ben and Jane drive down the road. When they hit the ghost , the scene fades to black. When the scene fades back in , it's snowing heavily , and a thick sheet of snow covers the ground. They start talking as they get out of the car , and the snow stops.
1482
Continuity: After Helena holds up the key while looking at the tower the immediate next shot shows the key facing the opposite direction.
tp
Continuity : After Helena holds up the key while looking at the tower , the immediate next shot shows the key facing the opposite direction.
1483
Factual errors: When Morgan is fleeing on the coach the British ship opens fire on her with cannon which have absolutely no recoil and fire exploding shot.
tp
Factual errors : When Morgan is fleeing on the coach , the British ship opens fire on her with cannon which have absolutely no recoil and fire exploding shot.
1484
Factual errors: Icelandic last names are very simple consisting of the father's name plus either "sson" if the child is a boy or "dottir" if the child is a girl but almost none of the Icelandic skaters have last names that could actually exist in the Icelandic language
tp
Factual errors : Icelandic last names are very simple , consisting of the father's name plus either "sson" if the child is a boy , or "dottir" if the child is a girl , but almost none of the Icelandic skaters have last names that could actually exist in the Icelandic language
1485
Continuity: After Charlie spots the bomb everybody evacuates the building. Charlie is in the doorway just as the bomb blows. Yet in a bigger shot of the explosion when the good guys are getting knocked down by the blast no one is in the doorway. In the next shot Charlie is shown being blasted out of the doorway.
tp
Continuity : After Charlie spots the bomb , everybody evacuates the building. Charlie is in the doorway just as the bomb blows. Yet in a bigger shot of the explosion when the good guys are getting knocked down by the blast , no one is in the doorway. In the next shot Charlie is shown being blasted out of the doorway.
1486
Revealing mistakes: Some of the Chinese soldiers with goggles that go marching by are obviously Caucasian.
tp
Revealing mistakes : Some of the Chinese soldiers with goggles that go marching by are obviously Caucasian.
1487
Factual errors: When they turn on the lights in the dark Costco it instantly becomes brightly lit. In reality HID lamps are very dim when first switched on and require several minutes to warm up and reach full brightness.
tp
Factual errors : When they turn on the lights in the dark Costco , it instantly becomes brightly lit. In reality , HID lamps are very dim when first switched on and require several minutes to warm up and reach full brightness.
1488
Revealing mistakes: At the R.B.T.V. Station when a security guard is tossed from Bullwinkle's antlers the glass shatters before the guard is thrown through it.
tp
Revealing mistakes : At the R.B.T.V. Station , when a security guard is tossed from Bullwinkle's antlers , the glass shatters before the guard is thrown through it.
1489
Factual errors: In the book by Douglas Preston and Lincoln Child the monster has been in the museum's subbasement for around seven years making the lair filled with either partially or fully decomposed skeletons completely plausible. However in the movie they change the duration to only six weeks. The lair they find in the movie with tons of skeletons doesn't connect with the time it took for them to become that decomposed.
tp
Factual errors : In the book by Douglas Preston and Lincoln Child , the monster has been in the museum's subbasement for around seven years , making the lair filled with either partially or fully decomposed skeletons completely plausible. However , in the movie they change the duration to only six weeks. The lair they find in the movie with tons of skeletons doesn't connect with the time it took for them to become that decomposed.
1490
Continuity: During the "control room" battle the regeneration chamber computer flashes "HEALING COMPLETE" during the shot showing the code has been broken - but later the healing is not yet complete.
tp
Continuity : During the "control room" battle , the regeneration chamber computer flashes "HEALING COMPLETE" during the shot showing the code has been broken - but later , the healing is not yet complete.
1491
Errors made by characters (possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers): Numerous times Rachael is referred to as "Miss Armstrong" but since she's married the correct title is "Mrs."
tp
Errors made by characters ( possibly deliberate errors by the filmmakers ): Numerous times , Rachael is referred to as "Miss Armstrong" , but since she's married , the correct title is "Mrs."
1492
Audio/visual unsynchronized: When Lainie tells her father she got the job in New York and he shows her all the videotapes he has of her. When she uses the remote to start the tape the audio starts before the video does.
tp
Audio / visual unsynchronized : When Lainie tells her father she got the job in New York and he shows her all the videotapes he has of her. When she uses the remote to start the tape , the audio starts before the video does.
1493
Continuity: While Reverend Bacon is accusing District Attorney Abe Weiss the TV remote control that Weiss is using switches hands between shots.
tp
Continuity : While Reverend Bacon is accusing District Attorney Abe Weiss , the TV remote control that Weiss is using switches hands between shots.
1494
Revealing mistakes: When the cab skids off the road and down the hill you can see that it never actually hits the tree. It is yanked back before it hits it.
tp
Revealing mistakes : When the cab skids off the road and down the hill you can see that it never actually hits the tree. It is yanked back before it hits it.
1495
Continuity: When Jess struggle with the shooter she escapes over the rail to a lower deck but her attacker chases after her going up the stairs.
tp
Continuity : When Jess struggle with the shooter , she escapes over the rail to a lower deck , but her attacker chases after her going up the stairs.
1496
Anachronisms: In Virginia's "fear of flying" scene at the airport there is an airplane hangar with a sign for "Mobil" attached to it. The "Mobil" design seen was not introduced until the late 1950s. The movie is set in the mid-1940s and the design that would have been used at that time was Mobil's logo of a white shield with large red Pegasus (flying horse) trademark and the name "Mobilgas" in black.
tp
Anachronisms : In Virginia's "fear of flying" scene at the airport , there is an airplane hangar with a sign for "Mobil" attached to it. The "Mobil" design seen was not introduced until the late 1950s. The movie is set in the mid - 1940s , and the design that would have been used at that time was Mobil's logo of a white shield with large red Pegasus ( flying horse ) trademark and the name "Mobilgas" in black.
1497
Continuity: When Patrick Ross is raping the girl in the supermarket parking lot she drops her purse just outside the rear door of the black van he does not pick it up. A moment later when Col. Burges and Press arrive at the same van the purse is gone.
tp
Continuity : When Patrick Ross is raping the girl in the supermarket parking lot , she drops her purse just outside the rear door of the black van , he does not pick it up. A moment later when Col. Burges and Press arrive at the same van , the purse is gone.
1498
Factual errors: In March of 1836 Antonio Lopez de Santa Anna was about 42 years old. Emilio Echevarria while his birth date is publicly unknown is (visibly) significantly older not close to resembling how Santa Anna looked at the time.
tp
Factual errors : In March of 1836 , Antonio Lopez de Santa Anna was about 42 years old. Emilio Echevarria , while his birth date is publicly unknown , is ( visibly ) significantly older , not close to resembling how Santa Anna looked at the time.
1499
Continuity: Mike drags Carol's needlepoint to his side of the bed (the right side) but when Cindy interrupts what Mike and Carol are doing the needlepoint is on the left side of the bed where Carol originally was.
tp
Continuity : Mike drags Carol's needlepoint to his side of the bed ( the right side ), but when Cindy interrupts what Mike and Carol are doing , the needlepoint is on the left side of the bed where Carol originally was.

tp

1504
Continuity: The shaving foam on Tibi's face changes during the chase of Bootsie.
tp
